anya-e1202n0:317_1: pāṭaliputtadvāre oruyha rañño santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi rājā tuṭṭho sāmaṇerassa hatthato pattaṃ
anya-e1202n0:317_2: gahetvā bhojetvā bhagavato pattaṃ gaṇdhehi ubbaṭṭetvā varamuttasadisānaṃ dhātūnaṃ pūretvā adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:318_0: So tuṃ gahetvā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upasaṅkami sakko devārājā sāmaṇeraṃ disvā kiṃ bhante sumana āhiṇḍasīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:318_1: Tvaṃ mahārāja amhe tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ pahiṇitvā kasmā pamajjasīti,
anya-e1202n0:318_4: Tumhākaṃ kira hatthe dve dhātuyo atthi dakkhiṇadāṭhā ca dakkhiṇakkhakañca,
anya-e1202n0:318_5: tato tumhe dakkhiṇadāṭhaṃ pūjetha dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ pana mayhaṃ dethāti.
anya-e1202n0:318_6: Sādhu bhanteti kho sakko devānamiṇdo yojanappamānaṃ maṇithūpaṃ ugghāṭetvā dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ nīharitvā sumanassa adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:319_0: So taṃ gahetvā cetiyagirimhiyeva patiṭṭhāsi atha kho mahiṇdapamukhā sabbe te mahānāgā asokadhammarājena
anya-e1202n0:319_1: dinna dhātuyo cetiyagiriyamhiyeva patiṭṭhāpetvā dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ ādāya vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya mahānāga vanuyyānamagamaṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:319_2: Rājāpi kho sumanena vuttappakāraṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ katvā hatthikkhaṇdhavaragato sāyaṃ maṅgalahatthimatthake
anya-e1202n0:320_4: dhātu caṅgoṭakaṃ mayhaṃ matthake patiṭṭhahatūti saha rañño cittuppādena chattaṃ apanami hatthijaṇṇukehi
anya-e1202n0:320_5: patiṭṭhahi dhātucaṅgoṭakaṃ rañño matthake patiṭṭhahi rājā amatenevābhisittagatto paramena pītipāmojjena
anya-e1202n0:320_6: samannāgato hutvā pucchi dhātuṃ bhante kiṃ karomīti.
anya-e1202n0:320_9: Pamudito nāgo kuñcanādaṃ nadi mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā pokkharavassaṃ vasisi ukadapariyantaṃ katvā mahābhūmicālo
anya-e1202n0:320_10: ahosi paccantepi nāma sammāsambuddhassa dhātuyo patiṭṭhahissantīti.
anya-e1202n0:321_0: Atha so hatthināgo aneka tālāvacaraparivuto ativiya uḷārena pūjāsakkārena sakkariyamāno pacchimadisābhimukho
anya-e1202n0:321_1: hutvā apasakkanto yāva nagarassa puratthima dvāraṃ tāva gantvā puratthimena dvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā
anya-e1202n0:321_2: sakalanagare uḷārāya pūjāya kayirāmānāya dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā thūpārāmassa pacchimadisābhāge pabhejavatthu
anya-e1202n0:321_3: nāma kira atthi tattha gantvā puna thūpārāmābhimukho eva paṭinivatti.
anya-e1202n0:321_4: So ca purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ dhammakarakaṃ kāyabaṇdhanaṃ udakasāṭīkaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā katacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ hotī.
anya-e1202n0:321_5: Tadetaṃ vinaṭṭhesupi cetiyesu devatānubhāvena kaṇṭaka samākiṇṇasākhāhi nānāgacchehi parivutaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e1202n0:321_6: Mā naṃ koci ucciṭṭhā suvimala kacavarehi saṇdusesīti.
anya-e1202n0:322_0: Atha tassa hatthino purato gantvā rājapurisā sabba gacche chiṇditvā bhūmiṃ sodhetvā taṃ hatthatalasadisaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:322_1: Hatthināgo gantvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ purato katvā tassa pacchimadisābhāge bodhirukkhaṭṭhane aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:322_2: Athassa matthakato dhātuṃ oropetuṃ ārabhiṃsu nāgo oropetuṃ na deti.
anya-e1202n0:322_4: kasmā bhante nāgo dhātuṃ oropetuṃ na detīti
anya-e1202n0:323_1: Tasmiñca kāle abhayavāpiyā udakaṃ jinnaṃ hoti samantā bhūmi phalitā suuddharā mattikapiṇḍā.
anya-e1202n0:323_2: Tato mahājano sīghasīghaṃ mattikaṃ āharitvā hatthakumbhappamāṇaṃ vatthumakāsi.
anya-e1202n0:323_4: Yāva iṭṭhikā pariniṭṭhanti tāva hatthināgo katipāhaṃ divā bodhirukkhaṭṭhāne hatthisālāyaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e1202n0:324_0: Atha vatthuṃ vināpetvā rājā theraṃ pucchi,
anya-e1202n0:324_3: sādhu bhanteti rājā jaṅghappamāṇaṃ thūpaṃ cināpetvā dhātuoropanatthāya mahāsakkāraṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:325_0: Tato sakalanāgarā ca jānapadā ca dhātumha dassanatthaṃ santipatiṃsu sannipatite ca tasmiṃ mahājane dasabalassa
anya-e1202n0:325_1: dhātu hatthikumbhato sattatālappamānaṃ vehāsamabbhuggantvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
anya-e1202n0:325_2: Tehi tehi dhātuppadesehi chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo udakadharā ca aggikkhaṇdhā ca pavattanti.
anya-e1202n0:325_3: Sāvatthiyaṃ gaṇḍambamūle bhagavatā dassita pāṭihāriya sadisaṃ eva pāṭihāriyaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:325_5: api ca kho buddhānaṃyeva ānubhāvena bhagavā kira dharamānova adhiṭṭhāsi -
anya-e1202n0:325_6: tambapaṇṇidīpe anurādhapurassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ cetiyaṭṭhāne mama dakkhiṇakkhakadhātu
anya-e1202n0:328_0: Dhātusarīrato nikkhanta udakaphusitehi sakalehi tambapaṇṇidīpatale na koci aphuṭṭhokāso nāma ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:328_1: Evamassa taṃ dhātu sarīraṃ udakaphusitehi tambapaṇṇitthalassa paridāhaṃ vūpasametvā mahājanassa pāṭihāriyaṃ
anya-e1202n0:328_2: dassetvā otaritvā rañño matthake patiṭṭhāsi rājā saphalaṃ manussattapaṭilābhaṃ maññamāno mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ
anya-e1202n0:328_4: Saha dhātupatiṭṭhānena mahābhūmicālo ahosi niṭṭhite pana thūpe rājā ca rājā bhātikā ca deviyo ca de- nāga-
anya-e1202n0:333_0: Sādhujana manopasādanatthāya kate thūpavaṃse thūpārāma kathā,
anya-e1202n0:334_1: Niṭṭhitāya pana dhātupūjāya patiṭṭhite dhātuvare mahiṇdatthero mahāmeghavanuyyānameva gantvāvāsaṃ kappesi.
anya-e1202n0:334_2: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye anulādevī pabbajitukāmā hutvā rañño ārocesi.
anya-e1202n0:334_3: Rājā tassā vacanaṃ sutvā theraṃ etadavoca?
anya-e1202n0:334_5: pabbājetha nanta na mahārāja amhākaṃ mātugāmaṃ pabbājetuṃ kappati.
anya-e1202n0:334_6: Pāṭaliputte pana mayhaṃ bhagini saṅghamittā therī nāma atthi,
anya-e1202n0:334_8: imasmiñca dīpe purimakānañca tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ bodhi patiṭṭhaṃsi amhākampi bhagavato sarasa raṃsijāla vissajjanakena bodhinā patiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:334_9: tasmā sāsanaṃ pahiṇeyyasi yathā saṅghamittā bodhiṃ gahetvā āgaccheyyāti.
anya-e1202n0:335_0: Rājā therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā amaccehi saddhiṃ mantento ariṭṭhaṃ nāma attano bhāgineyyaṃ āha sakkhissasi
anya-e1202n0:335_1: tvaṃ tāta pāṭalīputtaṃ gantvā mahābodhinā saddhiṃ ayyaṃ saṅghamittattheriṃ ānetunti sakkhissāmi deva
anya-e1202n0:336_1: So rañño ca therissa ca sāsanaṃ gahetvā therassa adhiṭṭhānavasena ekadivase na jambukolapaṭṭanaṃ gantvā
anya-e1202n0:336_2: nāvaṃ abhirūhitva samuddaṃ atikkamitvā pāṭalīputtaṃ gantvā rañño sāsanaṃ ācikkhi-
anya-e1202n0:336_4: Sahāyassa kira te devānampiyatissassa bhātujāyā anulādevī nāma pabbajitukāmā,
anya-e1202n0:337_0: Therassa sāsanaṃ ārocetvā saṅghamittattheriṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha.
anya-e1202n0:337_1: Ayye tumhākaṃ bhātā mahiṇdatthero maṃ tumhākaṃ santikaṃ pesesi devānampiyatissa rañño bhātujāyā anulādevī
anya-e1202n0:337_2: nāma pañcahi kaññāsatehi pañcahi ca antepurisā satehi saddhiṃ pabbajitukāmāti,
anya-e1202n0:338_0: Sā tāva deva turita turitā gantvā raññā tैmatthaṃ ārocetvā gacchāmahaṃ mahārāja tambapaṇṇidīpanti āha.
anya-e1202n0:339_0: Tena hi amma mahābodhiṃ gahetvā gacchāhīti vatvā pāṭalīputtato yāva mahābodhi tāva maggaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:339_1: sattayojanāyāmaya tiyojana vitthatāya mahatiyā senāya pāṭaliputtato nikkhamitvā ariyasaṅghaṃ ādāya mahābodhisamīpaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e1202n0:340_0: Senāya samussita dhajapatākaṃ nānāratana vicittaṃ anekālaṅkāra patimaṇḍitaṃ nānāvidha kusuma samākiṇṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:340_1: aneka turiya saṃghraṭṭhaṃ mahābodhiṃ parikkhipi tato rājā puppha- gaṇdha-
anya-e1202n0:340_2: mālādīhi pūjetvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vaṇditvā uṭṭhāya añjalimpaggayha ṭhatvā
anya-e1202n0:340_3: saccavacanakiriyāya bodhiṃ gaṇhitukāmo ratanapīṭhaṃ āruyha tulikaṃ gahetvā manosilāya lekhaṃ katvā yadi
anya-e1202n0:340_6: mahābodhi sayameva imasmiṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahatūti saccakiriyamakāsi saha saccakiriyāya bodhisākhā
anya-e1202n0:340_7: manosilāya paricchinnaṭṭhānehi chiṇditvā gaṇdha kalala pūrassa suvaṇṇakaṭāhassa upari aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:341_0: Tato rājā mahābodhiṃ bodhimaṇḍato mahantena sakkārena pāṭalīputtaṃ ānetvā sabbaparihārāni datvā mahābodhiṃ
anya-e1202n0:341_1: gaṅgāya nāvaṃ āropetvā sayampi nagarato nikkhamitvā viñjhāṭaviṃ samatikkamma anupubbena sattadivasehi
anya-e1202n0:342_0: Rājāpi samuddatīre sattadivasāni mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvā mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā bodhimpi saṃṅghamittattherimpi
anya-e1202n0:342_1: saparivāraṃ nāvaṃ āropetvā gacchati vatare dasabalassa sarasa raṃsijālā muñcamāno mahābodhi rukkhoti
anya-e1202n0:342_2: kaṇditvā añjalimpaggahetvā assūni pavattayamāno aṭṭhāsi sāpi kho mahābodhi samarūḷhanāvā passato passato
anya-e1202n0:342_3: mahārājassa mahāsamuddatalaṃ pakkhaṇdi mahāsamuddepi samantā yojanaṃ vīci vūpasantā pañcavaṇṇāni padumāni
anya-e1202n0:342_4: pupphitāni antalikkhe dibbaturiyāni vajjiṃsu ākāse jala thala sannissitāhi devatāhi pavattitā ativiya
anya-e1202n0:342_6: Evaṃ mahatiyā pūjāya sā nāvā jambukolapaṭṭanaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1202n0:343_0: Devānampiyatissa mahārājāpi uttaradvārato paṭṭhāya yāva jambukolapaṭṭanā maggaṃ sodhāpetvā alaṅkārāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:343_1: nagarato nikkhamana divase uttaradvāra samīpe saddasālāvatthusmiṃ ṭhito tāya vibhūtiyā mahāsamudde āgacchantaṃyeva
anya-e1202n0:343_2: mahābodhiṃ therassānubhāvena disvā tuṭṭhamānaso nikkhamitvā sabbaṃ maggaṃ pañcavaṇṇehi pupphehi okiranto
anya-e1202n0:343_3: antarantarā pupphaagghiyāni ṭhapento ekāheneva jambukolapaṭṭanaṃ gantvā sabbatālāvacara parivuto puppha
anya-e1202n0:343_4: dhūpagaṇdhādīhi pūjayamāno galappamaṃnaṃ udakaṃ oruyha āgato vata redasabalassa sarasa raṃsijālaṃ vissajjanako
anya-e1202n0:343_5: bodhirukkhoti pasannacitto mahābodhiṃ ukkhipitvā uttamaṅge sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhapetvā mahābodhiṃ parivāretvā
anya-e1202n0:343_6: āgatehi soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi saddhiṃ samuddato paccuttaritvā samuddatīre bodhiṃ ṭhapetvā tīṇi
anya-e1202n0:344_0: Atha catutthe divase mahābodhiṃ ādāya uḷāraṃ pūjaṃ kurumāno anupubbena anurādhapuraṃ sampatte anurādhapurepi
anya-e1202n0:344_1: mahāsakkāraṃ katvā cātuddasī divase vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya mahābodhiṃ uttaradvārena pavesetvā nagaramajjhana
anya-e1202n0:344_2: atiharitvā dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā dakkhiṇadvārato pañcadhanu satike ṭhāne yattha amhākaṃ sammāsambuddho
anya-e1202n0:344_4: Purimakā ca tayo sammāsambuddhā samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:344_9: tasmiṃ mahāmeghavanuyyānassa tilakabhūte katabhūmi parikamme rājavatthudvārakoṭṭhakaṭṭhāne mahābodhiṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:348_1: Anulādevī pañcahi kaññāsatehi pañcahi antepurisā satehīti mātugāmasahassena saddhiṃ saṅghamittattheriyā
anya-e1202n0:348_2: santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva saparivārā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:348_3: Ariṭṭhopi kho rañño bhāgineyyo pañcahi purisa satehi saddhiṃ therassa santike pabbajitvā saparivāro nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:348_4: Athekadivasaṃ rājā bodhiṃ vaṇditvā therena saddhiṃ thūpārāmaṃ gacchati.
anya-e1202n0:348_5: Tassa lohapāsādaṭṭhānaṃ sampattassa purisā pupphāni āhariṃsu rājā therassa pupphāni adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:348_6: Thero pupphehi lohapāsādaṭṭhānaṃ pūjesi pupphesu bhūmiyā patita mattesu mahābhūmicālo ahosi?
anya-e1202n0:349_0: Rājā kasmā bhante bhūmi calitāni pucchi.
anya-e1202n0:349_1: Imasmiṃ mahārāja okāse anāgate saṅghassa uposathāgāraṃ bhavissati.
anya-e1202n0:349_3: Puna tassa mahācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ sampattassa campaka pupphāni abhihariṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:349_5: Thero mahācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ pupphehi pūjetvā vaṇdi tāvadeva mahāpathavī saṃkampi.
anya-e1202n0:349_6: Rājā bhante kasmā pathavī kampitthāti pucchi.
anya-e1202n0:349_7: Mahārāja imasmiṃ ṭhāne anāgate buddhassa bhagavato asadiso mahāthūpo bhavissati.
anya-e1202n0:349_10: Alaṃ mahārāja tumhākaṃ aññaṃ bahuṃ kammaṃ atthi.
anya-e1202n0:349_11: Tumhākaṃ pana nantā duṭṭhagāmaṇī abhayo nāma kāressatīti.
anya-e1202n0:350_0: Atha rājā sace bhante mayhaṃ nantā karissati.
anya-e1202n0:350_1: Kataṃyeva mayāti dvādasahatthaṃ pāsāṇatthamhaṃ āharāpetvā devānampiyatissa rañño nattā duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhayo
anya-e1202n0:350_2: nāma imasmiṃ padese thūpaṃ karotīti akkharāni likhāpetvā patiṭṭhāpesīti atha devānampiyatissarājā cetiyapappate
anya-e1202n0:350_3: nihitā sammāsambuddha bhutta patta pūretvā āhaṭā dhātuyohatthikkhaṇdhena āharāpetvā sakalatambapaṇṇidīpe
anya-e1202n0:350_4: yojane yojane thūpaṃ kāretvā dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpesi bhagavato pattaṃ pana rāja geheyava ṭhapetvā pūjamakāsīti.
anya-e1202n0:354_0: Atha rājā aññāni ca bahūni puññakammāni katvā cattālīsa vassāni rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:354_1: Tassa accayena taṃ kaniṭṭho uttiya rājā dasavassāni rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:354_2: Tassa accayena taṃ kaniṭṭho mahāsīvo dasavassāneva rajjaṃ kāresi tassa accayena tassāpi kaniṭṭho sūratisso
anya-e1202n0:354_3: dasavassāneva rajjaṃ kāresi tato assanāvika puttā dve damiḷā sūratissaṃ gahetvā dvevīsa vassāni dhammena
anya-e1202n0:354_5: Te gahetvā muṭasīvassa rañño putto aselo nāma dasavassāni rajjaṃ kāresi atha coḷaraṭṭhato agantvā eḷāro
anya-e1202n0:354_6: nāma damilo asela bhūpatiṃ gahetvā catucattālīsa vassāni rajjaṃ kāresi eḷāraṃ gahetvā duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhayo
anya-e1202n0:356_1: Devānampiyatissa rañño kira dutiyabhātiko uparājā mahānāgo nāma ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:356_2: Atha rañño devī attano puttassa rajjaṃ icchanti taracchanāvā vāpiṃ karontassa uparājassavisena ambaṃ
anya-e1202n0:356_3: yojetvā ambamatthake ṭhapetvā pesesi deviyi putte,
anya-e1202n0:356_4: uparājena saddhiṃ gato bhājane vivaṭe sayameva amabaṃ gahetvā khāditvā kālamakāsi uparājā taṃ kāraṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:356_5: ñatvā deviyā bhīto tatoyeva attano deviñca balavāhanañca gahetvā rohaṇaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e1202n0:356_6: Tassa aggamahesi antarāmagge yaṭṭālavihāre nāma puttaṃ vijāyi tassa tissoti bhātunāma’makaṃsi.
anya-e1202n0:357_0: So tato gantvā mahāgāme vasanto rohaṇe rajjaṃ kāresi tassa accayena tassa putto yaṭṭālatisso mahāgāmeyeva rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:357_1: Tassa accayena tassāpi putto goṭhābhayo nāma tattheva rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:357_2: Goṭhābhayassa putto kākavaṇṇatisso nāma tattheva rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:357_3: Kākavaṇṇatissa rañño kira kalyāṇitissa rañño dhītā vihāramahādevī nāma aggamahesi ahosi sā rañño piyā ahosi manāpā.
anya-e1202n0:357_4: Rājā tāya saddhiṃ samaggavāsaṃ vasanto puññāni karonto vihāsi.
anya-e1202n0:357_5: Athekadivasaṃ devī rājageheyeva bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā sāyaṇhasamaye gaṇdhamālādīni gāhāpetvā dhammaṃ sotuṃ vihāraṃgatā,
anya-e1202n0:357_6: tattha nipannaṃ bāḷhagilānaṃ āsannamaraṇaṃ sīlavantaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ disvā gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā attano sampattiṃ
anya-e1202n0:357_7: vaṇṇetvā mama puttabhāvaṃ patthetha bhanteti yāci.
anya-e1202n0:358_2: Sāmaṇeropi evaṃ sante sāsanānuggahaṃ kātuṃ sakkātisampaṭicchitvā gatinimittavasena upaṭṭhitampi devalokaṃ
anya-e1202n0:358_3: chaḍḍetvā nikantivasena suvaṇṇa sivikāya gacchantiyā deviyā kucchimhi paṭisaṇdhiṃ gaṇhi.
anya-e1202n0:359_2: Aparabhāge aparampi tassa tissoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:359_3: Gāmaṇi kumāro kamena vaḍḍhento soḷasa vassiko hutvā hatthassa tharā sippesu kovido tejobala parakkama sampanno ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:359_11: labhiyyavasabhoti ime dasāmahāyodhe puttassa santike ṭhapetvā vāsesi.
anya-e1202n0:360_0: Tesaṃ uppattikathā mahāvaṃsato gahetabbā rājā dasamahāyodhānaṃ puttassa sakkārasamaṃsakkāraṃ kāresi tissakumāraṃ
anya-e1202n0:360_1: janapada rakkhanatthāya dīghavāpiyaṃ ṭhapesi athekadivasaṃ gāmiṇī kumāro attano balavāhana sampattiṃ
anya-e1202n0:360_2: disvā damiḷehi saddhiṃ yujjhassāmīti rañño kathāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:360_3: Rājā puttaṃ anurakkhanto alaṃ oragaṅganti nivāresi.
anya-e1202n0:360_4: So yāva tatiyaṃ kathāpesi rājā kujjhitvā hemasaṅkhalikaṃ karotha baṇdhitvā rakkhissāmīti.
anya-e1202n0:360_5: Abhayo pitu rañño kujjhitvā palāyitvā malayaṃ agamāsi tato paṭṭhāya pitari duṭṭhattā duṭṭhagāmaṇīti paññāto
anya-e1202n0:360_6: rājā puttānaṃ kalahaṭṭhānaṃ āgamanatthāya yodhehi sapathaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:361_0: Atha kākavaṇṇatissa rājā catusaṭṭhivihāre kāretvā catusaṭṭhi saṃvaccharāneva ṭhatvā kālamakāsi tissakumāro
anya-e1202n0:361_1: pitukālakatabhāvaṃ sutvā dīghavāpito āgantvā pitu sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā mātaraṃ -
anya-e1202n0:361_2: kaṇḍula hatthiñca gahetvā bhātu bhayā dīghavāpiṃ agamāsi.
anya-e1202n0:361_3: Amaccā sannipatitvā taṃ pavattiṃ vatvā duṭṭhagāmaṇitissa santikaṃ pesesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:361_4: So taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā bhuttasālaṃ āgamma bhātu santikaṃ dūte pesetvā tato mahāgāmaṃ āgantvā abhisekaṃ
anya-e1202n0:361_5: patvā mātaraṃ kaṇḍulahatthiñca pesetūti yāva tatiyaṃ bhātu santikaṃ lekhā pesetvā apesana bhāvaṃ ñatvā
anya-e1202n0:361_8: Cuḷaṅgaṇiya piṭṭhiyaṃ dvinnaṃ bhātūnaṃ mahāyuddhaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:362_0: Te kira yodhā sapathassa katattā tesaṃ yuddhe sahāyā na bhaviṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:362_2: Rājā parajjitvā tissāmaccaṃ dighatuṇikaṃ vaḷavañca gahetvā palāyi.
anya-e1202n0:362_5: Taṃ disvā kumāro bhikkhusaṅghassa kammanti ñatvā nivatti rājā palāyitvā kappaṇdakara nadiyā jalamālatitthaṃ nāma gantvaṃ chātomhiti āha.
anya-e1202n0:363_0: Rājā kālaṃ sallakkhetvā saṅghassa datvā bhuñjāmiti saṅghassa-
anya-e1202n0:363_2: attano cāti catubhāgaṃ katvā kālā ghosāpesi tadā piyaṅgudipato kuṭumbiyatissatthero nāma āgantvā purato aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:363_3: Rājā theraṃ disvā pasannamānaso saṅghassa ṭhapitabhāgaṃ attano bhāgañca therassa patte pakkhipiṃ amaccopi
anya-e1202n0:363_4: attano bhāgaṃ pakkhipi vaḷavāpi dātukāmā ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:363_5: Tassābhippāyaṃ ñatvā amacco tassāpi bhāgaṃ patte pakkhipi.
anya-e1202n0:364_0: Iti so rājā therassa paripuṇṇa bhattapattaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:364_1: Thero pattaṃ gahetvā gantvā gotamattherassa nāma adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:364_2: So pañcasata bhikkhu bhojetvā puna tato laddhehi bhāgehi pattapūretvā ākāse khipi patto gantvā rañño
anya-e1202n0:364_3: purato aṭṭhāsi tisso pattaṃ gahetvā rājānaṃ bhojetvā tato sayaṃ bhuñjitvā vaḷavaṃ bhojesi.
anya-e1202n0:364_4: Tato rājā sannāhaṃ cumbaṭakaṃ katvā pattaṃ vissajjesi.
anya-e1202n0:364_6: rājā puna mahāgāmaṃ āgantvā senaṃ saṅkaḍḍivo saṭṭhisahassabalā gahetvā puna bhātarā saddhiṃ yujjhi tadā kumārassa aneka sahassaṃ manussā patiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:365_0: Kumāro palāyitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā mahātherassa gehaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1202n0:366_0: Rājā pacchato pacchato anubaṇdhanto vihāraṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā nivatti pacchā therā te ubho bhātaro aññamaññaṃ khamāpesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:366_1: Tadā rājā sassakammāni kāretuṃ tissakumāraṃ dīghavāpimeva pahiṇitvā sayampi bheraṃ carāpetvā sassakammāni kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:366_2: Atha mahājanassa saṅgahaṃkatvā kunte dhātuṃ nidhāpetvā balavāhana parivuto tissārāmaṃ gantvā saṅghaṃ
anya-e1202n0:366_3: vaṇditvā bhante sāsanaṃ jotetuṃ pāragaṅgaṃ gamissāmi sakkāretuṃ amhehi sahagāmino bhikkhu dethāti āha.
anya-e1202n0:367_1: Rājā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā kaṇḍulahatthimāruyha yodhehi parivuto mahatā balakāyena yuddhāya nikkhamitvā
anya-e1202n0:367_2: mahiyaṅgaṇaṃ āganantvā tattha damiḷehi saddhiṃ yujjhanto mahiyaṅgaṇe kañcuka thūpaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:368_1: Bhagavā kira bodhite navame māse imaṃ dīpamāgantvā gaṅgātīre tiyojanāyate yojanavitthate mahānāgavanuyyāne
anya-e1202n0:368_2: yakkhasamāgamaṃ āgantvā tesaṃ yakkhānaṃ uparibhāge mahiyaṅgaṇa thūpassa ṭhāne vehāsayaṃ ṭhito vuṭṭhi
anya-e1202n0:368_3: vātaṇdhakārādīhi yakkhe santāsetvā tehi abhayaṃ yācito tumhākaṃ abhayaṃ dassāmi tumhe samaggā mayhaṃ
anya-e1202n0:369_3: Tato bhagavā tesaṃ bhayaṃ apanuditvā tehi dinnabhabhūmiyaṃ cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā tattha nisinno tejokasiṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:369_5: Te cammakhaṇḍena abhibhūnā samantato sāgara pariyante rāsibhūtā ahesuṃ bhagavā iddhibalena giridīpaṃ
anya-e1202n0:369_6: nāma idhānetvā tattha yakkhe pavesetvā dīpaṃ yathāṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā cammakhaṇḍaṃ saṅkhipi tadā devatā samāgamo ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:369_7: Tasmiṃ samāgame bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi- tadā.
anya-e1202n0:375_0: Pāṇimatte adā kese tassa pāṇihito jino;
anya-e1202n0:376_0: So taṃ suvaṇṇicaṅgoṭaṃ-carenādāya satthuno, nisinnaṭṭhāna racite-nānāratanasañcaye.
anya-e1202n0:379_0: Parinibbute pana bhagavati dhammasenāpati sāri puttattherassa antevāsiko sarabhū nāmeko thero citakato
anya-e1202n0:379_1: gīvaṭṭhidhātu gahetvā bhikkhu saṅghaparivuto āgantvā tasmiṃyeva cetiye patiṭṭhāpetvā meghavaṇṇapāsāṇehi
anya-e1202n0:379_2: chādetvā dvādasa hatthubbedhaṃ thūpaṃ kāretvā pakkāmi.
anya-e1202n0:379_3: Atha devānampiyatissa rañño bhātā cūḷābhayo nāma taṃ abbhutaṃ cetiyaṃ disvā tiṃsahatthubbedhaṃ cetiyaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:379_4: Idāni duṭṭhagāmaṇīpi abhayarājā mahiyaṅgaṇaṃ āgantvā tattha damiḷe maddanto asitihatthubbedhaṃ kañcukacetiyaṃ kāretvā pūjamakāsi.
anya-e1202n0:380_0: Evamaccāyikaṃ kammaṃ-karontāpi guṇākarā, karonti puññaṃ sappaññā-saṃsārabhasa bhīrukāti.
anya-e1202n0:382_1: Tato rājā damiḷehi saddhiṃ yujjhitvā chattadamiḷaṃ gaṇhitvā tatra bahu damiḷe ghātetvā ambatitthaṃ āgantvā ambadamiḷaṃ catūhi māsehi gaṇhi.
anya-e1202n0:382_2: Tato oruyha mahabbale sattadamiḷe ekāheneva gaṇhi tato antarasobbhe mahākoṭṭha damiḷaṃ-
anya-e1202n0:382_7: Tato kacchatitthe kiñcisīsa damiḷaṃ catūhi māsehi gaṇhi tato veṭha nagare tāḷa damiḷaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:382_13: tambunnagāmake mātula bhāgineyye dve damiḷe gaṇhi tadā-
anya-e1202n0:389_1: Ghātita so sabbe āgantvā vijita nagare pavisiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:389_2: Tadā rājā vijita nagaraṃ gaṇhituṃ vīmaṃsanatthāya āgacchantaṃ naṇdhimittaṃ disvā kaṇḍulaṃ muñcesi.
anya-e1202n0:389_3: Kaṇḍulopi taṃ gaṇhituṃ āgañchi tadā naṇdhimitto hatthetahi ubho dante bāḷhaṃ gahetvā pīḷetvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:389_5: Tato dakkhiṇadvāre yodhānaṃ mahāsaṅgāmo ahosi puratthimadvāre veḷusumano assaṃ āruyha bahū damiḷe ghātesi damiḷā anto pivisitvā dvāraṃ thakesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:389_7: kaṇḍulahatthi naṇdhimitto suranimmalo ca dakkhiṇadvāre kammaṃ kariṃsu mahāsoṇo goṭhayimbaro theraputtābhayo
anya-e1202n0:389_8: cāti ime tayo itaresu tīsu dvāresu kammaṃ kariṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:390_2: ayo dvārayuttaṃ ahosi kaṇḍulo jāṇuhi ṭhatvā silā sudhā iṭṭhakā bhiṇditvā ayodvāraṃ pāpuṇi tadā damiḷā
anya-e1202n0:390_3: gopure ṭhatvā nānāvudhāni khipiṃsu pakka ayoguḷe cevapakkaṭṭhita silesañca hatthipiṭṭhiyaṃ pakkhipiṃsu?
anya-e1202n0:390_4: Tadā kaṇḍulo vedanaṭṭo udakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā udake ogāhi.
anya-e1202n0:390_5: Tadā goṭhayimbaro na idaṃ surāpānaṃ bhavati.
anya-e1202n0:390_8: Taṃ sutvā jātābhimāto kuñcanādaṃ katvā udana uggamma thale aṭṭhāsi atha hatthivejjo silesaṃ dhovitvā osadhaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1202n0:390_9: Tato rājā hatthiṃ āruyha pāṇinā kumbhe parāmasitvā sakala laṅkātale rajjaṃ tava dammīti tosetvā varabhojanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:390_10: bhojetvā vaṇaṃ sāṭakena veṭhetvā suvammītaṃ katvā vammapiṭṭhiyaṃ mahisacammaṃ sattaguṇaṃ katvā baṇdhitvā
anya-e1202n0:390_11: tassupari telacammaṃ baṇdhitvā taṃ vissajjesi so asani viyagajjanto gantvā dāṭhāhi padaraṃ vijjhitvā
anya-e1202n0:390_13: Dvāraṃ bāhāhi saddhiṃ ayodvāraṃ mahāsaddena bhūmiyaṃ pati.
anya-e1202n0:390_14: Gopure dabbasambhāraṃ pana hatthipiṭṭhiyaṃ patantaṃ disvā naṇdhimitto bāhāhi paharitvā pavaṭṭesi tadā kaṇḍulo dāṭhāpīḷanaveraṃ chaḍḍhesi.
anya-e1202n0:391_0: Tato kaṇḍulo attano piṭṭhiṃ ārūhanatthāya naṇdhimittaṃ olokesi.
anya-e1202n0:391_1: So tayā katamaggena na pavisissāmīti aṭṭhārasa hatthubbedhaṃ pākāraṃ bāhunā paharitvā aṭṭhusahappamāṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:391_2: pākārappadesaṃ pātetvā suranimmalaṃ olokesi sopi tena katamaggaṃ anicchanto pākāraṃ laḍḍītvā nagarabbhantare
anya-e1202n0:391_4: theraputtābhayopi ekeka dvāraṃ bhiṇditvā pavisiṃsu- tato.
anya-e1202n0:396_0: Evaṃ vijitanagaraṃ catūhi māsehi bhiṇditvā damiḷe māretvā tato garilokaṃ nāma gantvā giriya damiḷaṃ aggahesi.
anya-e1202n0:396_1: Tato mahela nagaraṃ gantvā catūhi māsehi mahela rājānaṃ gaṇhiṃ tato rājā anurudhapuraṃ gacchanto paritokāsapabbate
anya-e1202n0:396_2: nāma khaṇdhāvāraṃ nivāsetvā tattha taḷākaṃ kāretvā jeṭṭhamūlamāsamhi udakakīḷaṃ kīḷi.
anya-e1202n0:396_3: Eḷāropi duṭṭhagāmaṇissa āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā amaccehi saddhiṃ mantetvā sve yuddhaṃ karissāmāti nicchayaṃ
anya-e1202n0:396_4: akāsi punadivase sannaddho mahāpabbata hatthiṃ āruyha mahā balakāya parivuto nikkhami.
anya-e1202n0:396_5: Gāmaṇīpi mātarā saddhiṃ mantetvā dvattiṃsa bala koṭṭhake kāretvā chattadhare rājarūpake tattha tattha ṭhapesi.
anya-e1202n0:397_0: Tato saṅgāme vattamāne eḷāra rañño dīghajattu nāma mahā yodho khaggaphalakaṃ gahetvā bhūmito aṭṭhārasa
anya-e1202n0:397_1: hatthaṃ nabhamuggantvā rājarūpaṃ chiṇditvā paṭhamaṃ bala koṭṭhakaṃ bhiṇdi evaṃ sesepi balakoṭṭhake bhiṇditvā
anya-e1202n0:397_3: Tadā suranimmalo rañño parigacchantaṃ disvā attano nāmaṃ sāvetvā taṃ akkosi taṃ sutvā dīghajantu paṭhamaṃ
anya-e1202n0:397_4: imaṃ māremīti kujjhitvā ākasamabbhuggantvā attanopari otarantaṃ disvā saranimmalo attano phalakaṃ upanāmesi.
anya-e1202n0:397_5: Itaropi phalakena saddhiṃ taṃ bhiṇdissa mīti cintetvā phalakaṃ pahari.
anya-e1202n0:397_10: asanisaddo viya ahosi ummādappattā viya manussā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:397_12: eḷāro palāyittha tadāpi bahu damiḷe ghātesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:401_0: Na hanissatu eḷāraṃ-maṃ muñciya paro iti;
anya-e1202n0:407_0: Tomaraṃ khipi eḷāro-sahatthi tattha so pati;
anya-e1202n0:410_0: Atha rājā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā samantā yojanappamāṇe manusse sannipātetvā eḷāra rañño sarīraṃ mahantaṃ
anya-e1202n0:410_1: sakkāraṃ kāretvā kūṭāgārena netvā jhāpetvā tattha teciyaṃ kāretvā parihāramadāsi.
anya-e1202n0:410_2: Ajjapi rājāno taṃ padesampatvā bheriṃ na vādāpenti.
anya-e1202n0:410_3: Evaṃ duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhaya mahārājā dvattiṃsa damiḷa rājāno māretvā laṅkādīpaṃ ekacchattamakāsi.
anya-e1202n0:411_0: Yadā duṭṭhagāmaṇi vijitaṃ nagaraṃ gaṇhi tadā dīghajantu yodho eḷāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano bhāgineyyassa
anya-e1202n0:411_1: bhallukassa yodha bhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā idhāgamanatthāya tassa santikaṃ pesesi.
anya-e1202n0:411_2: Bhallukopi eḷārassa daḍḍhadivasato sattame divase saṭṭhiyā purisa sahassehi saddhiṃ otiṇṇo rañño matabhāvaṃ
anya-e1202n0:411_3: sutvāpi lajjāya yujjhissāmīti mahātitthato nikkhamitvā kolambahālake nāma gāme khaṇdhāvāraṃ nivesesi.
anya-e1202n0:411_4: Rājāpi tassā’gamanaṃ sutvā sannaddho kaṇḍulaṃ āruyha yodhaparivuto mahatā balakāyena abhinikkhami.
anya-e1202n0:411_5: Phussadevopi pañcāvudha sannaddho rañño pacchimāsane nisīdi.
anya-e1202n0:411_6: Bhallukopi pañcāvudha sannaddho hatthiṃ āruyha rājābhimukho agañchi.
anya-e1202n0:411_7: Tadā kaṇḍulo tassa vegamaṇdi bhāvatthaṃ sanikaṃ sanikaṃ paccosakaki senāpi hatthinā saddhiṃ tatheva paccosakaki.
anya-e1202n0:412_0: Rājā phussadevaṃ āha ayaṃ hatthi pubbe aṭṭhavīsatiyā yuddhesu apaccosakakitvā idāni kasmā pana paccosakkatīti.
anya-e1202n0:412_2: Amhākameva jayo ayaṃ gajo jayabhūmiṃ avekkhanto paccosakkati jayabhūmiṃ patvā ṭhassatīti?
anya-e1202n0:412_3: Nāgopi paccosakakitva pura devassa passe mahāvihāra sīmante aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:413_0: Tato bhalluko rājābhimukhā āgantvā rājānaṃ uppaṇḍesi rājāpi khaggatalena mukhaṃ pidhāya taṃ akkosi rañño mukhe vijjhissāmīti saraṃ khipi.
anya-e1202n0:413_3: akāsi tadā rañño pacchimāsane nisinno phussadevo rañño kuṇḍalaṃ ghaṭento tassa mukhe kaṇḍaṃ pātesi rañño
anya-e1202n0:413_4: pāde katvā patamānassa jāṇumhi aparena kaṇḍena vijjhitvā rañño sīsaṃ katvā pātesi.
anya-e1202n0:413_5: Rājā laddhajayo nagaraṃ āgantvā saraṃ āharāpetvā puṅkhena ujukaṃ ṭhapāpetvā taṃ pamāṇaṃ kahāpaṇarāsiṃ katvā phussadevassa adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:414_0: Evaṃ laṅkārajjaṃ ekacchattaṃ katvā rājā yodhānaṃ yathānurūpaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:414_1: Theraputtābhayo pana dīyamānaṃ ṭṭhānantaraṃ na gaṇhi kasmā na gaṇhasiti pucchino yuddhaṃ atthi mahārājāti āhaṃ.
anya-e1202n0:414_2: Idāni ekarajje kate kiṃ nāma yuddhanti pucchite kilesa corehi yujjhissa mīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:414_3: Rājā punappunaṃ nivāresi sopi punappuna yācitvā rājānuññāya pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ patvā pañca khīṇāsavasata parivāro ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:415_0: Tato rājā attano pāsādatale sirīsayanagato mahatiṃ sampattiṃ oloketvā akkhobhiṇi senāghātaṃ anussari.
anya-e1202n0:415_1: Anussarantassa rañño mahantaṃ demanassaṃ uppajji sagga maggantarāyo me bhaveyyāti.
anya-e1202n0:416_0: Tadā piyaṅgudīpe arahanto rañño paricitakkaṃ ñatvā taṃ assāsetuṃ aṭṭha arahante pesse.
anya-e1202n0:416_1: Te āgantvā āgatabhāvā nivedetvā pāsādatalaṃ abhiruhiṃsu rājā there vaṇditvā āsane nisīdāpetvā āgata kāraṇaṃ pucchi.
anya-e1202n0:416_2: Therāpi āgata kāraṇaṃ vatvā rañño tena kammunā sagga-
anya-e1202n0:416_3: mokkhantarāyabhāvaṃ bodhetva pakkamiṃsu rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā assāsaṃ paṭilabhitvā vaṇditvā (te vissajjetvā) sirisayanagato puna cintesi.
anya-e1202n0:417_0: Mātipitaro kho pana mā co kadācipi vinā saṅghena āhāraṃ bhuñjathāti amhehi sapathaṃ kāresuṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa
anya-e1202n0:417_1: adatvā bhuttaṃ atthi nu kho natthiti cintayanto satisammosena saṅghassa adatvā pātarāsakāle paribhuttaṃ
anya-e1202n0:417_3: Disvā ca ayuttaṃ mayā kataṃ daṇḍakammaṃ me kātabbantī cintesi atha rājā chattamaṅgala sattāhe vītivatte
anya-e1202n0:417_4: mahatā rājānubhāvena mahantena kīḷāvidhānena udakakīḷaṃ kīḷituṃ abhisittānaṃ rājunaṃ cārittānu pālanatthañca
anya-e1202n0:417_6: Rañño sabbaṃ paricchadaṃ upāhanachattāni ca maricavaṭṭi vihāraṭṭhānamhi ṭhapayiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:418_0: Tatrāpi thūpaṭṭhāne rājapurisā rañño sadhātukaṃ kuntaṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:418_1: Rājā divasabhāgaṃ orodha parivuto kīḷitvā sāyaṇhe jāte nagaraṃ gamissāma kuntaṃ vaḍḍhethāti āha.
anya-e1202n0:418_2: Rājapurisā kuntaṃ gaṇhantā cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu rājasena,
anya-e1202n0:418_3: taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā samāgantvā gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjesi rājāpi mahantaṃ acchariyaṃ disvā haṭṭhamānaso samantā ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahitvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1202n0:419_0: Tato rājā kuntaṃ parikkhipāpetvā cetiyaṃ taṃ parikkhipāpetvā vihārañca kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:419_1: Vihāro tīhi saṃvaccharehi niṭṭhāsiṃ rājā vihāramahatthāya saṅghaṃ sannipātesi bhikkhūnaṃ satasahassāni
anya-e1202n0:419_2: bhikkhunīnaṃ navuti sahassāni sannipatiṃsu tasmiṃ samāgame rājā saṅghaṃ vaṇditvā evamāha bhante vissaritvā
anya-e1202n0:419_3: vinā saṅghena maricavaṭṭikaṃ paribhuñjiṃ tadatthaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ me hotūti-
anya-e1202n0:419_4: sacetiyaṃ maricavaṭṭiyaṃ vihāraṃ kāresiṃ patigaṇhātu bhante saṅgho sacetiyaṃ vihāranti dakkhiṇodakaṃ pātetvā bhikkhusaṅghassa vihāraṃ adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:420_0: Vihārassa samantato bhikkhusaṅghassa nisīdanatthāya mahantaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāresi maṇḍapa pādā abhayavāpiyā jale patiṭṭhitā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:420_2: Tattha bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sabbaparikkhāraṃ adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:420_3: Tattha saṅghattherena laddha parikkhāro satasahassagghanako ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:433_1: Tato rājā cintesi mahāmahiṇdatthero kira mama ayyakassa devānampiyatissa rañño evamāha.
anya-e1202n0:433_2: Nattā te mahārāja duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhayo visaṃ hatthasatikaṃ sovaṇṇamāliṃ thūpaṃ kāressati.
anya-e1202n0:433_3: Saṅghassa ca uposathāgārabhūtaṃ navabhūmakaṃ lohapāsādaṃ kāressatīti cintetvā ca pana olokento rājagehe
anya-e1202n0:433_4: karaṇḍake ṭhapitaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭalekhaṃ disvā taṃ vācesi.
anya-e1202n0:433_5: Anāgate cattālīsaṃ vassasataṃ atikkamma kākavaṇṇatissassa putto duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhayo idañcidañca kāressatīti sutvā haṭṭho udaggo appoṭhesi-
anya-e1202n0:433_6: ayyena kira vatamhi diṭṭho mahā mahiṇdenāti.
anya-e1202n0:434_0: Tato pātova mahāmeghavanaṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā etadavoca?
anya-e1202n0:434_1: Bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa uposathāgāraṃ katvā devavimāna sadisaṃ pāsādaṃ kāressāmi devalokaṃ pesetvā paṭe vimānākāraṃ likhāpetvā me dethāti?
anya-e1202n0:434_3: Te tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā dvādasayojanubbedhā aṭṭhacattālīsa yojana parikkhepaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ sahassa patimaṇḍitaṃ
anya-e1202n0:434_4: navabhūmakaṃ sahassagabbhaṃ khīraṇa devadhītāya puññānubhāvanibbattaṃ ākāsaṭṭhaṃ ratanapāsādaṃ oloketvā
anya-e1202n0:434_5: hiṅgulakena paṭe tadākāraṃ likhitvā ānetvā bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṃsu saṅgho rañño pāhesi.
anya-e1202n0:435_0: Taṃ disvā rājā tuṭṭhamānaso tadā taṃ lekhatulyaṃ lohapāsādaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:435_1: Kammantārambha kāle pana catusu dvāresu aṭṭhasatasahassāni hiraññāni ṭhapāpesi tadā catusu dvāresu sahassa sahassaṃ vatthapuṭāni ceva guḷa- tela- sakkhara-
anya-e1202n0:435_3: Pāsāde amūlakena kammaṃ na kātabbanti bheriṃ cārapetvā amūlakena katakammaṃ agghāpetvā kārakānaṃ mūlaṃ dāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:435_4: Pāsādo ekekena passena hatthasata hatthasatappamāṇo ahosi tathā ubbedhana,
anya-e1202n0:435_5: navabhūmāyo cassa ahesuṃ ekekissā bhūmiyā sataṃ sataṃ kūṭāgārāni,
anya-e1202n0:435_6: tāni sabbānipi ratanakhacitāni ceva suvaṇṇa kiṅkiṇikāpanti parikkhittāni ca ahesuṃ tesaṃ kūṭāgārāni nānāratana bhūsikā pavāḷa vedikā ceva,
anya-e1202n0:435_7: tāsaṃ padumāni ca nānāratana vicittāneva ahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:435_8: Tathā sahassagabbhā ca nānāratana khacitā sīyapañjara vibhūsitā ca.
anya-e1202n0:435_9: Vessavanassa nārivābhanayānaṃ sutvā tadākāraṃ majjhe ratana maṇḍapaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:436_0: So anekehi ratanatthambhehi sīhavyagghādi rūpehi devatā rūpehi ca patimaṇḍito samantato olambaka muttā
anya-e1202n0:436_1: jālena ca parikkhitto ahosi pavāḷavedikā cassa pubbe vuttappakārāva sattaratana vicittamaṇḍapa majjhe
anya-e1202n0:436_2: pana eḷikamaya bhūmiyā dantamaya pallaṅko ahosi apassenampi dantamayameva,
anya-e1202n0:436_3: so suvaṇṇasūriyamaṇḍalehi rajata caṇda maṇḍalehi muttāmaya tārakāhi ca vicitto tattha tattha yathārahaṃ
anya-e1202n0:436_4: nānāratanamaya padumāni ceva pasāda janakāni ca jātakāni antarantarā suvaṇṇalatāyo ca kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:436_5: Tattha mahagghaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ attharitvā manuññaṃ danta vijaniṃ ṭhapesi.
anya-e1202n0:436_7: Tathā pallaṅkassopari eḷikabhūmiyā patiṭṭhitaṃ rajatamayadaṇḍaṃ setaccattaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:436_8: Tattha sattaratanamayāni aṭṭhamaṅgalāni antarantarā ca maṇimuttāmayā catuppāda pantiyo ca kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:437_0: Pāsādo chattaṃ pallaṅko maṇḍapo cāti cattāro anagghā ahesuṃ mahagghāni mañcapīṭhāni paññatvo tattha mahagghāni
anya-e1202n0:437_1: kambalāni bhummattharaṇāni attharāpesi āvamana kumhi uḷuṅko ca sovaṇṇamayāyeva ahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:437_2: Sesa paribhoga bhaṇḍesu vattabbameva natthi dvārakoṭṭhakopi manohara pākārena parikkhitto.
anya-e1202n0:437_3: Tambalohiṭṭhikābhi pana chāditattā pāsādassa lohapāsādoti vohāro ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:438_0: Evaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavane devasabhā viya pāsādaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā saṅghaṃ sannipātesi.
anya-e1202n0:438_7: Evaṃ saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā saṅghassa pāsādaṃ datvā maricavaṭṭi vihāramahe viya sattāhaṃ mahādānamadāsīti.
anya-e1202n0:443_1: Athekadivasaṃ rājā satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā mahābodhi pūjaṃ kāretvā nagaraṃ pavisanto thūpaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e1202n0:443_2: silāthūpaṃ disvā mahiṇdattherena vuttavacanaṃ anussaritvā mahāthūpaṃ kāressāmīti katasanniṭṭhāno nagaraṃ
anya-e1202n0:443_3: pavisitvā mahaṃtalaṃ āruyha subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā sirisayanagato evaṃ cintesi mayā damiḷe maddamānena
anya-e1202n0:443_5: kena nu kho upāyena lokassa piḷanaṃ akatvā dhammena samena mahā cetiyassa anucchavikaṃ iṭṭhakā uppādessāmīti
anya-e1202n0:443_6: taṃ cintitaṃ chattaṃ adhivatthā devatā jānitvā rājā evaṃ cintesīti ugghosesi.
anya-e1202n0:444_0: Paramparāya devalokepi kolāhalamahosi taṃ ñatvā sakko devarājaṃ vissakammaṃ āmantetvā’tāta! Vissa kamma!
anya-e1202n0:444_1: Duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhaya mahārājā mahā cetiyassa iṭṭhakatthāya cintesi.
anya-e1202n0:444_2: Tvaṃ gantvā uttarapasse nagarato yojanappamāṇe ṭhāne gambhira nadiyā tīre iṭṭhakā māpetvā ehi’ti pesesi.
anya-e1202n0:445_0: Taṃ ñatvā vissakamma devaputto āgantvā tattheva mahācetiyānucchavikaṃ iṭṭhakā māpetvā devapurameva gato.
anya-e1202n0:445_1: Puna divase eko sunakhaluddo sunakhe gahetvā araññaṃ gantvā tattha tattha vicaranto taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā iṭṭhakā adisvā ca nikkhami.
anya-e1202n0:445_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe ekā bhummā devatā tassa iṭṭhakā dassetuṃ mahantaṃ godhāvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā luddassa sunakhānañca
anya-e1202n0:445_3: attānaṃ dassetvā tehi anubaddho iṭṭhakābhimukhaṃ attvā antaradhāyi.
anya-e1202n0:446_0: Sunakhaluddo iṭṭhakā disvā amhākaṃ rājā thūpaṃ kāretukāmo,
anya-e1202n0:446_1: mahanto vata no paṇṇākāro laddhoti haṭṭhamānaso puna divase pātoca āgantvā attanā diṭṭhaṃ iṭṭhaka paṇṇākāraṃ rañño nivedesi.
anya-e1202n0:446_2: Rājā taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā attamano hutvā tassa mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kāretvā taṃyeva iṭṭhaka gopanaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:447_0: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe puna aññaṃ sāsanaṃ āhariṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:447_1: Nagarato tiyojanamatthake ṭhāne pubbuttarakaṇṇe ācāra viṭṭhigāme tiyāmarattiṃ abhippavaṭṭe deve soḷasa karīsappamāṇe padese suvaṇṇabījāni uṭṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:447_4: atha vibhātāya rattiyā gāmavāsino suvaṇṇabijāni disvā rāchā’rahaṃ vata bhaṇḍaṃ uppannanti samantato ārakkhā
anya-e1202n0:447_5: saṃvidahitvā suvaṇṇabījāni pātiyaṃ pūretvā āgantvā rañño dassesuṃ rājā tesampi yathārahaṃ sakkāraṃ kāretvā
anya-e1202n0:448_0: Atha tasmiṃyeva khaṇe aññaṃ sāsanaṃ āhariṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:448_1: Nagarato pācīnapasse sattayojana matthako ṭhāne pāragaṅgāya tambaviṭṭhi nāma janapade tambalohaṃ uppajji.
anya-e1202n0:448_2: Gāmikā pātiṃ pūretvā tambalohaṃ gahetvā āgantvā rañño dassesuṃ rājā yathānurūpaṃ sakkāraṃ tesampi kāretvā teyeva gopake akāsi.
anya-e1202n0:449_1: Purato catuyojanamatthako ṭhāne pubbadakkhiṇa kaṇṇe sumanavāpigāme uppalakuruviṇda missakā bahū maṇayo
anya-e1202n0:449_2: uppajjiṃsu gāmikā pātiṃ pūretvā āgantvā mānayo rañño dassesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:449_3: Rājā tesampi sakkāraṃ kāretvā teyeva gopake akāsi.
anya-e1202n0:450_1: Nagarato dakkhiṇa passe aṭṭhayojana matthake ṭhāne ambaṭṭhakola janapade ekasmiṃ leṇe rajataṃ uppajji
anya-e1202n0:450_2: tasmiṃ samaye nagaravāsiko eko vāṇijo bahūhi sakaṭehi haḷiddi siṅgiverādīnamatthāya malayaṃ gato,
anya-e1202n0:450_3: leṇassa avidūre sakaṭāni muñcitvā patodadāruṃ pariyesanto taṃ pabbataṃ abhirūḷho ekaṃ paṇasayaṭṭhiṃ addasa.
anya-e1202n0:451_0: Tassa mahantaṃ cāṭippamāṇaṃ ekameva paṇasa phalaṃ naruṇayaṭṭhiṃ nāmetvā heṭṭhā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:451_1: So taṃ phalabhārena namitaṃ disvā upagantvā hatthena parāmasitvā pakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā vaṇṭaṃ chiṇdi paṇasayaṭṭhi
anya-e1202n0:451_2: uggantvā yaṭāṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhāsi vāṇijo aggaṃ datvā bhuñjissāmīti cintetvā kālaṃ ghosesi.
anya-e1202n0:451_3: Tadā cattāro khīṇāsava āgantvā tassa purato pāturahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:451_4: Vāṇijo te disvā attamano pāde vaṇditvā nisīdāpetvā tassa phalassa vaṇṭāsamantā vāsiyā tacchetvā apassayaṃ luñcitvā apanāmesi.
anya-e1202n0:451_5: Samantato yusaṃ otaritvā apassayānitaṃ āvāṭaṃ pūresi vāṇijo manosilodakavaṇṇa paṇasayusaṃ patte pūretvā adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:451_6: Te khīṇāsavā tassa passantasseva ākāsamabbhuggantvā pakkamiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:452_0: So puna kālaṃghosesi aññe cattaro khīṇāsavā āgamiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:452_1: Tesampi hatthato patte gahetvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇehi pana samiñjehi pūretvā adāsi tesu tayo therā ākāsena pakkamiṃsu
anya-e1202n0:452_2: itaro iṇdaguttatthero nāma khīṇāsavo tassa taṃ rajataṃ dassetukāmo upari pabbatā otaritvā tassa leṇassa
anya-e1202n0:452_3: avidūre nisīditvā paṇasa miñjaṃ paribhuñjati upāsako therassa gatakāle avasesa miñjaṃ attanāpi khāditvā
anya-e1202n0:452_4: sesakaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā ādāya gacchanto theraṃ disvā udakañca pattadhovanasākhañca adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:453_0: Theropi leṇadvārena sakaṭa samīpagāmi maggaṃ māpetvā iminā maggena gaccha upāsakāti āha.
anya-e1202n0:453_1: So theraṃ vaṇditvā tena maggena gacchanto leṇadvāraṃ patvā samantā leṇaṃ olokento taṃ rajatarāsiṃ disvā
anya-e1202n0:453_2: rajatapiṇḍaṃ gahetvā cāsiyā chiṇditvā rajatabhāvaṃ ñatvā mahantaṃ sajjhapiṇḍaṃ gahetvā sakaṭa santikaṃ
anya-e1202n0:453_3: gantvā tiṇodaka sampanne ṭhāne sakaṭāni nivesetvā lahuṃ anurādhapuraṃ gantvā raññño dassetvā tamatthaṃ
anya-e1202n0:453_4: nivedesi rājā tassāpi yathārahaṃ sakkāraṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:454_0: Tadantaraṃ aññampi sāsanaṃ āhariṃsu nagarato pacchima disābhāge pañca yojana matthake ṭhāne uruvela pabbata
anya-e1202n0:454_1: mahāmalakamattā pacāḷa missakā saṭṭhi sakaṭappamāṇamuttā samuddato thalamuggamiṃsu kevaṭṭā disvā rājārahaṃ
anya-e1202n0:454_2: vata bhaṇḍaṃ uppannanti rāsiṃ katvā ārakkhaṃ datvā pātiṃ pūretvā āgantvā rañño dassetvā tamatthaṃ nivedesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:455_0: Puna aññaṃ sāsanaṃ āhariṃsu nagarato pacchimuttara kaṇṇe sattayojana matthake ṭhāne peḷivāpi gāmassa
anya-e1202n0:455_1: vāpiyā otiṇṇa kaṇdare pulina puṭṭhe nisadapotappamāṇa dīghato vidatthicaturaṅgulā ummāpupphavaṇṇā cattāro
anya-e1202n0:455_3: Atheko matto nāma sunakhaluddo sunakhe gahetvā tattha vicaranto taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā disvā rājārahaṃ vata
anya-e1202n0:455_4: bhaṇḍanti vālikāhi paṭicchādetvā āgantvā rañño nivedesi.
anya-e1202n0:455_6: Evaṃ rājā thūpatthāya uppannāni iṭṭhakādīni tadaheva assosi iṭṭhaka rajatānaṃ uppannaṭṭhānaṃ teneva nāmaṃ labhi.
anya-e1202n0:457_1: Atha rājā thūpatthāya uppannāni suvaṇṇādīni āharāpetvā bhaṇḍāgāresu rāsiṃ kāresi tato sabbasambhāre samatte
anya-e1202n0:457_2: visākha puṇṇamuposathadivase patta visākha nakkhatte mahāthūpakaraṇatthāya bhūmiparikammaṃ ārabhi.
anya-e1202n0:457_3: Rājā thupaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhāpitaṃ silāthūpaṃ harāpetvā thirabhāvatthāya samantato hatthipākāra pariyantaṃ
anya-e1202n0:457_4: gambhīrato sataratanappamāṇaṃ bhūmiṃ khanāpetvā paṃsuṃ apanetvā yodhehi guḷapāsāṇe attharāpetvā kammārakūṭehi
anya-e1202n0:458_0: Tato cammavinaddhehi pādehi mahā hatthīhi maddāpetvā pāsāṇakoṭṭimassupari navanīta mattikaṃ attharāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:458_1: Ākāsa gaṅgāyahi tipatitaṭṭhāne udakabindūni uggantvā samantā tiṃsa yojanappamāṇapadese patanti yattha
anya-e1202n0:458_2: sayañjātasālī uppajjatti taṃ ṭhānaṃ niccameva tintattā nintasīsakoḷaṃ nāma chātaṃ.
anya-e1202n0:458_3: Tattha mattikā sukhumuttā navanīta mattikāti vuccati.
anya-e1202n0:459_0: Taṃ tato khīṇasavā sāmaṇerā āharanti tāya sabbattha mattikākiccanti ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e1202n0:459_5: tassopari khīṇāsava sāmaṇerehi himavantato āhaṭaṃ sugaṇdhamārumbaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:460_0: Silāsatthāropari rasodaka santintena kapittha niyyāsena aṭṭhaṅgulabahalatambalohapaṭṭaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:460_1: tassopari tilatelayantintāya manosilāya sattaṅgula bahalaṃ rajatapaṭṭaṃ attharāpesi evaṃ rājā sabbākārena
anya-e1202n0:460_2: bhūmiparikammaṃ kārāpetvā āsāḷahi sukkapakkhassa cātuddasa divase bhikkhusaṅghā sannipātetvā evamāha.
anya-e1202n0:460_3: Sve puṇṇamuposathadivase uttarāsāḷha nakkhattena mahācetiye maṅgaliṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhāpessāmi sve thūpūṭṭhāne
anya-e1202n0:460_4: sabbo saṅgho santipatatūti nagare bheriṃ carāpesi mahājano uposathiko hutvā gaṇdhamālādīni gahetvā thūpaṭṭhāne
anya-e1202n0:461_0: Tato visākhasiri devanāmake dve amacce āṇāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:461_2: Te gantvā samantato rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇavālukaṃ okīrāpetvā lājapañcamakāni pupphāni vikiritvā kadalitoraṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:461_3: ussāpetvā puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapāpetvā maṇivaṇṇe veḷumhi pañcapaṇṇadhajaṃ baṇdhāpetvā gaṇdhasampannāni nānāvidha
anya-e1202n0:462_0: Atha rājā sakalanagarañca vihāragāmi maggañca alaṅkārāpesi pabhātāya rattiyā nagare catusu dvāresu massu kammatthāya nahāpite,
anya-e1202n0:462_2: alaṅkāratthāya kappakeva nānāvirāga vattha gaṇdhamālādīni ca sūpavyañjana sampannāni madhurabhattāni
anya-e1202n0:462_3: ca ṭhapāpetvā sabbe nagarā ca jānapadā ca yathāruciṃ massūkammaṃ kāretvā nahātvā bhuñjitvā vatthābharaṇādīhi
anya-e1202n0:463_0: Sayampi sabbābharaṇa vibhūsito cattālīsa purisa sahassehi saddhiṃ uposako hutvā anekehi sumaṇḍita pasādhitehi
anya-e1202n0:463_1: amaccehi gahitārakkho alaṅkatāhi devakañña pamāhi nāṭakitthihi parivuto amaragaṇa parivuto devarājā viya
anya-e1202n0:463_2: attano sirisampattihā mahājanaṃ tosayanto anekehi turiya saṅghuṭṭhehi vattamānehi aparaṇhe mahāthūpaṭṭhānaṃ upagañji.
anya-e1202n0:463_3: Mahā cetiyaṭṭhāna maṅgalatthāya puṭabaddhāni vatthāni aṭṭhuttara sahassaṃ ṭhapāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:463_4: Catusu passesu vattharāsiṃ kāresi tela- madhu- sakkara-
anya-e1202n0:464_0: Atha nānādesato bahū bhikkhū āgamiṃsu rājagahā samantā iṇdiguttatthero nāma asīti bhikkhusahassāni gahetvā
anya-e1202n0:464_1: ākāsenāgañchi tathā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane mahā vihārato dhammasenatthero nāma dvādasa bhikkhusahassāni.
anya-e1202n0:464_2: Sāvatthiyaṃ jetavana vihārato piyadassi nāma thero saṭṭhi bhikkhu sahassāni vesāliyaṃ mahā vanato buddharakkhitatthero aṭṭhārasa bhikkhu sahassāni,
anya-e1202n0:464_4: Ujjeniyaṃ dakkhiṇagiri mahā vihārato dhammarakkhitatthero cattālīsa bhikkhusahassāni-
anya-e1202n0:464_5: pāṭaliputte asokārāmato mittiṇṇatthero bhikkhūnaṃ satasahassāni saṭṭhiñca sahassāni gaṇdhāra raṭṭhato
anya-e1202n0:464_6: attinna thero nāma bhikkhūnaṃ dve satasahassāni asītiñca sahassāni.
anya-e1202n0:464_7: Mahāpallava bhogato mahādevatthero bhikkhūnaṃ cattāri satasahassāni saṭṭhiñca sahassāni yonakaraṭṭhe
anya-e1202n0:464_8: alasaṇdā nagarato yonaka dhammarakkhitatthero tiṃsa bhikkhu sahassāni.
anya-e1202n0:464_10: Mahābodhimaṇḍa vihārato cittaguttatthero tiṃsa bhikkhusahassāni vanavāsibhogato caṇdaguttatthero asīti bhikkhusahassāni.
anya-e1202n0:464_11: Kelāsa mahāvihārato suribhaguttatthero channavuti sahassāni gahetvā ākāsenāgañchi.
anya-e1202n0:469_0: Atha saṅgho parikkhitta pavāḷavedikā viya majjhe rañño okāse ṭhapetvā aññamaññaṃ aghaṭṭetvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:469_1: Pācinapasse buddharakkhitanāmako khīṇāsāvatthero attanāsadisanāmake pañcasatakhīṇāsave gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:469_2: Tathā dakkhiṇapasse pacchimapasse uttarapasse ca dhammarakkhita -
anya-e1202n0:469_4: ānaṇda nāmakā khīṇāsavattherā attanā sadisanāmake pañcapañcasata khīṇāsave gahetvā aṭṭhaṃsu piyadassi
anya-e1202n0:469_5: nāma khīṇāsavatthero mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā pubbuttara kaṇṇe aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:470_0: Rājā kira saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisantoyeva sace mayā kayiramānaṃ cetiyakammaṃ anantarāyena niṭṭhaṃ gacchati pācina- dakkhiṇa- pacchima-
anya-e1202n0:470_4: ānaṇda nāmakā therā attanāsadisanāmake pañcapañcasatabhikkhu gahetvā tiṭṭhantu piyadassi nāma thero pubbuttarakaṇṇe
anya-e1202n0:470_6: Therāpi rañño adhippāyaṃ ñatvā tathā ṭhitāti vadantī siddhatthero pana maṅgalo- sumano- padumo- sīvali-
anya-e1202n0:470_10: acaloti imehi ekādasahi therehi parivuto puṇṇaghaṭe pūrato katvā puratthābhimukho aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:471_0: Atha rājā tathā ṭhitaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā pasannacitto gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu
anya-e1202n0:471_1: ṭhānesu vanditvā puṇṇasaṭaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā suyaṇṇakhīle paṭimukkaṃrajatamayaṃ paribbhamana daṇḍaṃ vijjamānamātāpitūnaṃ
anya-e1202n0:471_2: ubhato sujātena sumaṇḍita pasādhitena abhimaṅgala sammatena amaccaputtena gāhāpetvā mahantaṃ cetiyāvaṭṭaṃ
anya-e1202n0:471_8: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhusaṅgho mahā rāja thero pāṇḍito,
anya-e1202n0:472_0: Rājā bhikkhusaṅghassa adhippāyaṃ ñatvā thero karotīti maññamāno kīdisaṃ bhante pamāṇaṃ karomīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:472_1: Thero mama gatagataṭṭhānato cetiyāvaṭṭaṃ karohīti vatvā upadisanto āvijjhitvā agamāsi.
anya-e1202n0:472_2: Rājā therassa vuttanayena cetiyāvaṭṭaṃ kāretvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nāmaṃ pucchitvā gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā
anya-e1202n0:472_3: vambatvā parivāretvā ṭhite sesa ekādasa there ca upasaṅkamitvā pūjetvā vaṇditvā tesaṃ nāmāni ca pucchitvā
anya-e1202n0:472_4: paribbhamana daṇḍagāhakassa amacca puttassa tāma pucchi.
anya-e1202n0:473_0: Ahaṃ deva suppatiṭṭhita brahmā nāmāti vutte tava pitā kiṃ nāmoti pucchitvāna naṇdiseno nāmāti vutte mātunāmaṃ pucchi.
anya-e1202n0:473_1: Sumanādevī nāmāti vutte sabbesaṃ nāmāni abhimaṅgalasammatāni,
anya-e1202n0:473_2: mayā kayaramānaṃ cetiyakammaṃ avassaṃ niṭṭhānaṃ gacchatiti haṭṭho ahosi,
anya-e1202n0:473_3: tato rājā majjhe aṭṭha suvaṇṇaghaṭe rajataghaṭe ca ṭhapāpetvā te parivāretvā aṭṭhuttarasayassa puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:474_1: Tāsu ekekaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhuttarasata aṭṭhuttarasata rajatiṭṭhakāyo.
anya-e1202n0:474_3: Atha suppatiṭṭhita brahmanāmena amaccaputtena ekaṃ suvaṇṇiṭṭhakaṃ gāhāpetvā tena sadisa nāmehi ca jīvamānaka
anya-e1202n0:474_4: mātāpitūhi sattahi amaccaputtehi sesa sattiṭṭhakāyo gāhāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:475_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mittatthero nāma puratthima disābhāge paribbhamita lekhāya bhūmiyaṃ gaṇdhapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapesi.
anya-e1202n0:475_1: Jayasenatthero nāma udakaṃ āsiñcitvā santintetvā samaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1202n0:475_2: Suppatiṭṭhitabrahmā bhadda nakkhattena evaṃ nānāvidha maṅgalānisaṅkhaṭaṭṭhāne paṭhamaṃ maṅgalikaṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:475_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavi kampo ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:476_0: Tato rājā rajatiṭṭhakāyopi patiṭṭhāpetvā gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā maṅgalavidhānaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā suvaṇṇapelāyapupphāni
anya-e1202n0:476_1: gāhāpetvā pācīnapasse bhikkhusaṅghassa purato ṭhitaṃ mahā buddharakkhitattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā gaṇdhamālādīhi
anya-e1202n0:476_2: pūjetvā vaṇditvā therassa parivāretvā ṭhita bhikkhūnañca nāmāni pucchitvā tato dakkhiṇapasse ṭhitaṃ mahādhammarakkhitattheraṃ
anya-e1202n0:476_3: pacchimapasse ṭhitaṃ mahāsaṅgharakkhitattheraṃ uttarapasse ṭhitaṃ ānaṇdattherañca upasaṅkamitvā gaṇdhamālādīhi
anya-e1202n0:476_4: pūjetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vaṇditvā tatheva nāmāni pucchitvā pubbuttara kaṇṇaṃ gantvā tattha ṭhitaṃ piyadassi
anya-e1202n0:476_5: mahātheraṃ vaṇditvā pūjetvā nāmāni pucchitvā santike aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:477_0: Thero maṅgalaṃ vaḍḍhento rañño dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e1202n0:477_1: Maṅgalapariyosāne sampatta gihiparisāsu cattālīsa sahassāni arahanto patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:479_1: Tato rājā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vaṇditvā yāca mahācetiyaṃ niṭṭhātināva me bhikkhusaṅgho bhikkhaṃ gaṇhātūti āha.
anya-e1202n0:479_3: anupubbena yācanto upallabhikkhūnaṃ sattāhaṃ adhivāsanaṃ labhitvā thūpaṭṭhānassa samantato aṭṭhārasasu
anya-e1202n0:479_4: ṭhānesu maṇḍape kārayitvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sabbesaṃyeva tela- madhu-
anya-e1202n0:479_5: pāṇitādi bhesajjaṃ datvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vissajjesi tato nagare bheriṃcārāpetvā sabbe iṭṭhaka vaḍḍhaki santipātesi.
anya-e1202n0:480_0: Tesu eko ahaṃ rañño cittaṃ ārādhetvā mahācetiyaṃ kātuṃ sakkomīti rājānaṃ passi rājā kathaṃ karosīti pucchi.
anya-e1202n0:480_1: Ahaṃ deva pesikānaṃ sataṃ gahetvā ekāhaṃ ekaṃ paṃsusakaṭaṃ khepetvā kammaṃ karomīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:480_3: Tiṇarukkhādīni uppajjissanti addhānaṃ nappavattatīti taṃ paṭibāhi.
anya-e1202n0:481_0: Añño ahaṃ purisasataṃ gahetvā ekāhaṃ ekaṃ paṃsugumbaṃ khepetvā kammaṃ karomīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:482_0: Añño paṃsūnaṃ pañcammaṇāni khepetvā kammaṃ karomīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:483_0: Añño dve ammaṇāni khepetvā kammaṃ karomīti āha. Tepi rājā paṭibāhiyeva.
anya-e1202n0:484_0: Atha añño paṇḍito iṭṭhaka vaḍḍhakī ahaṃ deva udukkhale koṭṭetvā suppehi vaṭṭetvā nisadepiṃsitvā paṃsūnaṃ
anya-e1202n0:484_1: ekammaṇaṃ ekāheneva khepetvā pesikānaṃ sataṃ gahetvā kammaṃ karomīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:485_0: Rājā evaṃ sati mahācetiye tiṇādīni na bhavissanti ciraṭṭhitikañca bhavissatiti sampaṭicchitvā puna pucchi-
anya-e1202n0:486_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe vissakamma devaputto vaḍḍhakissa sarīre adhimucci.
anya-e1202n0:486_1: Vaḍḍhakī suvaṇṇapātiṃ pūretvā udakamāharāpetvā pāṇinā udakaṃ gahetvā udakapiṭṭhiyaṃ āhani.
anya-e1202n0:487_0: Rājā sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā tassa sahassagghanakaṃ sāṭaka yugalaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:487_1: sahassagghanakaṃyeva puṇṇakaṃ nāma suvaṇṇālaṅkāraṃ sahassagghanakā pādukā,
anya-e1202n0:487_2: dvādasa kahāpana sahassāni ca datvā anurūpaṭṭhāne gehañca khettañca dāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:488_0: Tato rājārattibhāge cintesi kathaṃ nāma manusse apīletvā iṭṭhakā āharāpeyyanti devatā rañño cittaṃ ñatvā
anya-e1202n0:488_1: cetiyassa catusu dvāresu ekekadivasappahoṇakaṃ katvā tassāyeva rattiyā iṭṭhakārāsiṃ akaṃsu vihātāya rattiyā
anya-e1202n0:488_4: Devatā eteneva nayena yāva mahācetiyassa niṭṭhānaṃ tāva ekekassa divasassa pahoṇakaṃ katvā iṭṭhakā āhariṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:488_5: Sakaladivasabhāge kammaṃ kataṭṭhāne mattikā iṭṭhaka cuṇṇaṃ vāpi na paññāyati.
anya-e1202n0:489_0: Atha rājā mahācetiyekammakārāyacatuparisāyahattha kammamūlatthaṃcatusu dvāresu ekekasmiṃ dvāre soḷasa kahāpana sahassāni vatthālaṅkāra- gaṇdha- māla- tela- madhu- pāṇita-
anya-e1202n0:489_1: pañcakaṭuka bhesajjāni nānāvidha sūpavyañjana saṃyuttaṃ bhattaṃ yāgukhajjakādīni aṭṭhavidha kappiyaya
anya-e1202n0:489_2: pānakāni pañcavidha mukhavāsa sahita tāmbūlāni ca ṭhapāpetvā mahācetiye kammaṃ karontāgahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā
anya-e1202n0:489_3: vā yathājjhāsayaṃ gaṇhantu mulaṃ agahetvā kammaṃ karontānaṃ kātuṃ na dethāti āṇāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:490_0: Atheko thero cetiyakamme sahāya bhāvaṃ icchanto kammakaraṇaṭṭhāne mattikā sadisaṃ katvā attānaṃ abhisaṅkhaṭaṃ
anya-e1202n0:490_1: mattikā piṇḍaṃ ekena hatthena gahetvā aññena mālā gahetvā mahācetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha rājakammike vañcetvā
anya-e1202n0:490_3: So gaṇhantova pakatimatti kā nā bhavatīti ñatvā therassa mukhaṃ olokesi tassākāraṃ ñatvā tattha kolāhala
anya-e1202n0:490_4: mahosi anukkamena rājā sutvā āgantvā vaḍḍhakiṃ pucchi-
anya-e1202n0:490_5: tuyhaṃ kira bhaṇe eko bhikkhu amūlaka mattikāpiṇḍaṃ adāsīti.
anya-e1202n0:491_1: yebhuyyena ayyā ekena hatthena pupphaṃ ekena mattikāpiṇḍe gahetvā āharitvā denti tenāhaṃ ajānitvā kamme upanesiṃ “ayaṃ pana āgantuko,
anya-e1202n0:491_2: ayaṃ nevāsikoti ettakaṃ jānāmīti.“Tena hi taṃ theraṃ imassa dassehīti ekaṃ mahallaka balatthaṃ vaḍḍhakissa
anya-e1202n0:491_3: santike ṭhapesi vaḍḍhakī puna āgatakāle taṃ theraṃ balatthassa dassesi so taṃ sañjānitvā rañño ārocesi.
anya-e1202n0:492_1: To tvaṃ tayo jātisumana makulakumbhe mahābodhi aṅgaṇe rāsiṃ katvā gaṇdhañca ṭhapetvā mahābodhi aṅgaṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:492_2: gata kāle āgantukassa therassa pūjanatthāya rañño dāpitaṃ gaṇdhamālānti vatvā dehīti.
anya-e1202n0:492_3: Balattho rañño vuttanayeneva tassa bodhi aṅgaṇaṃ gata kāle taṃ gaṇdhamālaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:493_0: Sopi somanassappatto hutvā selasaṇtharaṃ dhovitvā gaṇdhena paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā silāsaṇtharaṃ katvā pupphaṃ
anya-e1202n0:493_1: pūjetvā catusu ṭhānesu vaṇditvā pācīnadvāre añjaliṃ paggayha pītiṃ uppādetvā puppha pūjaṃ olokento aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:494_0: Balattho tasmiṃ kāle taṃ theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vaṇditvā evamāha.
anya-e1202n0:494_1: Bhante tumhākaṃ cetiyakamme sahāyabhāvatthāya dinnassa amūlaka mattikāpiṇḍassa mūlaṃ dinnabhāvaṃ rājā jānāpeti attano vaṇdanena vaṇdāpetīti.
anya-e1202n0:494_3: Balattho tiṭṭhantu bhante tayo sumana makula kumbhātattakāneva suvaṇṇapupphānipi etaṃ mattikapiṇḍaṃ nāgghanti.
anya-e1202n0:495_0: Tadā koṭṭhivālajanapade piyaṅgalla vihāravāsī eko thero iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakissa ñātako ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:495_1: So āgantvā vaḍḍhakinā saddhiṃ mantetvā dīgha bahala kiriyato iṭṭhakappamāṇaṃ jānitvā gantvā sahattheneva
anya-e1202n0:495_2: sakkaccaṃ mattikaṃ madditvā iṭṭhakaṃ katvā pacitvā pattatthavikāya pakkhipitvā paccāgantvā ekena hatthena
anya-e1202n0:495_3: rañño iṭṭhakaṃ ekena pupphaṃ gahetvā attano iṭṭhakāsa saddhiṃ rañño iṭṭhakaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:496_0: Thero sañjāta pīti somanasso mahācetiye kammaṃ karonto iṭṭha kasālapariveṇe vasati tassa taṃ kammaṃ pākaṭaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:496_2: bhaṇe ekena kira ayyena amūlika iṭṭhakā dinnāti.
anya-e1202n0:496_4: ekena ayyena dinna iṭṭhakā amhākaṃ iṭṭhakāya sadisāti kamme upanesinti āha.
anya-e1202n0:496_5: Puna taṃ iṭṭhakaṃ sañjānāsīti raññā vutte ñātakānuggahena na jānāmīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:497_0: Rājā yadi evaṃ taṃ imassa dannehīti balatthaṃ ṭhapesi so taṃ pubbe viya balatthassa dassesi.
anya-e1202n0:497_1: Balattho pariveṇaṃ gantvā santike nisīditvā paṭisaṇthāraṃ katvā bhante tumhe āgantukā nevāsikāti pucchi.
anya-e1202n0:497_3: Katara raṭṭhavāsiko bhanteti koṭṭhivālajanapade piyaṅgalla vihāravāsimhi upāsakāti idheva vasatha gacchathāti.
anya-e1202n0:497_4: Idha na vasāma asukadivase gacchāmāti āha.
anya-e1202n0:497_6: Mayhampi gāmo etasmiṃyeva janapade asuka gāmo nāmāti āha.
anya-e1202n0:498_0: Rājā balatthassa sahassagghanakaṃ vatthayugalaṃ mahagghaṃ rattakambalaṃ upāhanayugaṃ sugaṇdhatelanāḷiṃ
anya-e1202n0:498_1: aññca bahuṃ samaṇaparikkhāraṃ therassa dehīti dāpesi sopi parikkhāraṃ gahetvā pariveṇaṃ gantvā therena
anya-e1202n0:498_2: saddhiṃ rattiṃ vasitvā pāto saddhiṃyeva nikkhamitvā anupubbena gantvā piyaṅgalla vihārassa dissamāne
anya-e1202n0:498_3: ṭhāne sītacchāyāya theraṃ nisīdāpetvā pāde dhovitvā gaṇdhatelena makkhetvā guḷodakaṃ pāyetvā upāhanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:498_4: paṭimuñcitvā idaṃ me parikkhāraṃ kulūpagatherassatthāya gahitaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:498_6: idaṃ pana sāṭakayugaṃ mama puttassa maṅgalatthāya gahitaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:498_7: tumhe cīvaraṃ katvā pārupathāti vatvā therassa pādamūle ṭhapesi.
anya-e1202n0:499_0: Thero sāṭakayugaṃ pattatthavikāya pakkhipitvā sesaparikkhāraṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā upāhanaṃ āruyhaṃ kattayaṭṭhiṃ gahetvā maggaṃ paṭpajji.
anya-e1202n0:499_1: Balattho tena saddhiṃ thokaṃ gantvā “tiṭṭhatha bhante,
anya-e1202n0:499_2: mayhaṃ ayaṃ maggo“ti vatvā pubbe vuttanayeneva rañño sāsanaṃ therassa ārocesi
anya-e1202n0:500_0: Thero taṃ sutvā mahantena parakkamena katakammaṃ akataṃ viya jātanti domanassappatto hutvā assudhāraṃ
anya-e1202n0:500_1: pavattetvā’upāsaka tava parikkhāraṃ tvameva gaṇhāhī“ti ṭhitakova sabbāparikkhāraṃ chaḍḍesi balattho kiṃ
anya-e1202n0:500_2: nāma bhante vadatha esa rājā tuyhaṃ bhavaggappamāṇaṃ katvā paccayaṃ dentopi tava iṭṭhakānurūpaṃ kātuṃ
anya-e1202n0:500_4: Kevalaṃ pana mahācetiye kammaṃ aññesaṃ apattakaṃ katvā karomīti adhippāyena evaṃ kāreti tumhe pana bhante
anya-e1202n0:500_5: attanā laddhaparikkhāraṃ gahetvā cittaṃ pasādethāti vatvā theraṃ saññāpetvā pakkāmi.
anya-e1202n0:500_6: Imasmiṃ pana cetiye bhatiyā kammaṃ katvā cittaṃ pasādetvā sagge nibbatta sattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi.
anya-e1202n0:501_0: Tāvatiṃsa bhavane kira nibbatta devadhītaro attano sampattiṃ oloketvā kena nu ko kammena imaṃ sampattiṃ
anya-e1202n0:501_1: labhimhāti āvajjamānā mahācetiye bhatiyā kammaṃ katvā laddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhatiyā katakammassāpi phalaṃ īdisaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:501_2: attano santakena kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā katakammassa phalaṃ kīdisaṃ bhavissatīti cintetvā dibbagaṇdhamālaṃ
anya-e1202n0:501_3: ādāya rattibhāge āgantvā pūjetvā cetiyaṃ vaṇdanti.
anya-e1202n0:502_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhātivaṅkavāsī mahāsīvatthero nāma cetiyaṃ vaṇdanatthāya gato,
anya-e1202n0:502_1: tā vaṇdantiyo disvā mahāsattapaṇṇirukkhasamīpe ṭhito tāsaṃ yathāruciṃ vaṇditvā gamanakāle pucchi?
anya-e1202n0:502_3: kiṃ kammaṃ karitthāti bhante amhākaṃ santake katakammaṃ nāma natthi imasmiṃ cetiye manaṃ pasādetvā bhatiyā
anya-e1202n0:502_4: kammaṃ karimhāti āhaṃsu evaṃ buddhasāsane pasannacittena bhatiyā katakammampi mahapphalaṃ hoti. Tasmā-
anya-e1202n0:505_0: Evaṃ rājā cetiyakammaṃ kārāpento pupphadhānattayaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:505_1: Taṃ khīṇāsava thirabhāvatthāya bhūmisamaṃ katvā osīdāpesuṃ,
anya-e1202n0:505_3: Rājā kāraṇaṃ ajānanto anattamano hutvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātesi.
anya-e1202n0:505_4: Asīti bhikkhusahassāni sannipatiṃsu rājā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā vaṇditvā pucchi’bhante
anya-e1202n0:505_5: mahācetiye pupphadhānattayaṃ navavāre na jānāmī’ti bhikkhusaṅgho āha mahārāja tuyhaṃ kammassa vā jīvitassa
anya-e1202n0:505_10: Taṃ sutvā haṭṭho rājā thūpakammaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:506_0: Dasapupphadhānāni dasahi iṭṭhakākoṭīhi niṭṭhanaṃ gamiṃsu puna pupphadhānattaye niṭṭhite bhikkhusaṅgho uttara-
anya-e1202n0:506_1: sumana nāmake dve khīṇāsava sāmaṇere āṇāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:506_2: Tumhe samacaturassaṃ aṭṭharatana bahalaṃ ekeka passato asīti asiti hatthappamāṇaṃ chamedaka vaṇṇapāsāṇe āharathāti.
anya-e1202n0:506_3: Te sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā uttarakuruṃ gantvā cuttappakārappamāṇe bhaṇḍipupphanihecha medavaṇṇapāsāṇe
anya-e1202n0:506_4: āharitvā ekaṃ pāsāṇaṃ dhātugabbhassa bhūmiyaṃ attharitvā cattāro pāsāṇe catusu passesu saṃvidhāya aparaṃ
anya-e1202n0:506_5: dhātugabbhaṃ pidahanatthāya pācīna disābhāge vāluka pākāra samīpe adissamānaṃ katvā ṭhapesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:507_1: Tato rājā dhātugabbhassa majjhe sabbaratanamayaṃ sabbākārasampannaṃ manoharaṃ bodhirukkhaṃ kāresi so hi iṇdanīlamaṇibhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito,
anya-e1202n0:507_3: khaṇdho sirivacchādīhi aṭṭhamaṅgalikehi pupphapanti latāpanti catuppada haṃsapantihi ca vicitto aṭṭhārasa hatthubbedho rajatamayo ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:508_6: Tassa ante samannato muttamaya kiṅkiṇikajālaṃ olambati.
anya-e1202n0:508_7: Svaṇṇaghaṇṭāpanti ca suvaṇṇadāmāni ca tahiṃ tahiṃ olambanti vitānassa catusu kaṇṇesu navasatasahassagghanako ekeko muttākalāpo olambati.
anya-e1202n0:508_8: Tattha yathānurūpaṃ nānāratana katāneva caṇda- sūriya-
anya-e1202n0:508_10: Mahagghāni anekavaṇṇāni aṭṭhuttara sahassāni vatthāni olambiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:509_0: Tato bodhirukkhassa samantato satta ratanamaya vedikā kāretvā mahāmalaka muttā attharāpesi muttā vedikānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:509_1: antare gaṇdhodaka puṇṇa sattaratanamaya puṇṇaghaṭa pantiyo ṭhapāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:510_0: Bodhirukkhassa pācīna disābhāge ratanamaye koṭiagghanake pallaṅke ghanakoṭṭima suvaṇṇamayaṃ buddhapaṭimaṃ nisīdāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:510_1: Tassā paṭimāya vīsati nakhā akkhinaṃ setaṭṭhānāni ca phaḷakamayāni.
anya-e1202n0:510_2: Hatthatala pādatala dantāvaraṇāni akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhātāni ca pavāḷamayāni kesa bhamukāni akkhinaṃ kāḷakaṭṭhānāni
anya-e1202n0:510_3: ca iṇdanīla maṇimayāni uṇṇālomaṃ panaṃ rajatamayaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:510_4: Tato sahampati mahā brahmānaṃ rajatacchattaṃ dhāretvā ṭhinaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:510_5: Tatā dvīsu devalokesu devatāhi saddhiṃ vijayuttarasaṅkhaṃ gahetvā abhisekaṃ dadamānaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:510_6: pañcasikha devaputtaṃ beḷuva paṇḍu vīṇamādāya gaṇdhabbaṃ kurumānaṃ.
anya-e1202n0:510_7: Mahākāḷa nāgarājānaṃ nāgakaññāparivutaṃ nānāvidhenathutighosena tathāgataṃ vaṇṇentaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:511_0: Vasavattimārampana bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā tisūla muggarādi nānāvudhāni gahetvā sahassakumbhaṃ girimekhala
anya-e1202n0:511_1: hatthikkhaṇdha māruyha mārabalaṃ parivāretvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āgantvā aneka bhiṃsanakaṃ kurumānaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:511_2: Sesāsu disāsu pācīna disābhāge pallaṅkasadise koṭi koṭi agghanake tayo pallaṅke attharāpetvā dantamayaṃ daṇḍaṃ pavāḷavījaniṃ ṭhapāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:511_3: Bodhikkhaṇdhaṃ ussīsake katvā nānāratanaṃ maṇḍitaṃ koṭiagghanakaṃ rajata sayanaṃ attharāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:512_0: Dasabalassa abhisambodhimpatvā animisena cakkhunā bodhipallaṅkaṃ olokitaṭṭhānaṃ sattāhameva ratanacaṅkame
anya-e1202n0:512_1: caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ olokitaṭṭhānaṃ sattāhameva ratanacaṅkame caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ ratanagharaṃ pavisitvā dhammasammasitaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:512_2: mucaliṇdamūlaṃ gantvā nisinnassa mucaliṇdena nāgena sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:512_4: tato ajapāla nigrodha mūlaṃ gantvā nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:512_5: tato rājāyatanaṃ bhojane upanīte catumahārājehi upanīta pattapaṭiggahaṇaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:513_5: veḷuvana paṭiggahaṇaṃ asīti mahāsāvake ca kāresi tato kapilavatthugamanaṃ ratanacaṅkame ṭhataṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:515_0: Abhidhamma desanā devorohaṇa pāṭīhīraṃ therapañha samāgamañca kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:516_4: apalāla damanaṃ āyusaṅkhāra vossajjanaṃ sūkaramaddava pariggahaṇaṃ siṅgivaṇṇa vatthayuga paṭiggahaṇaṃ
anya-e1202n0:516_5: pasannodakapānaṃ parinibbānaṃ devamanussa paridevanaṃ mahākassapattherassabhagavatopādavaṇdanaṃ sarīra
anya-e1202n0:516_6: ṅahanaṃ agginibbānaṃ āḷāhanasakkāraṃ deṇena brāhmaṇena katadhātu vibhāgañca kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:517_1: Vessantarajātakaṃ pana kārento sañjaya mahārājaṃ phusatīdeviṃ maddideviṃ jāliya kumāraṃ kaṇhājinañca kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:517_2: Tato paṇḍava hatthidānaṃ satta sataka mahādānaṃ nagara vilokanaṃ siṇdhavadānaṃ devatāhi rohitatha vaṇṇena
anya-e1202n0:517_3: rathassa vahanaṃ rathadānaṃ sayamevoṇata dumato phalaṃ gahetvā dārakānaṃ madhumaṃsa dinna nesādassa suvaṇṇa
anya-e1202n0:517_4: sūcidānaṃ vaṅkapabbatakucchimhi pabbajjāvesena vasitaṭṭhānaṃ pūjakassa dārakadānaṃ sakkabrāhmaṇassa bhariyaṃdānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:517_5: pūjakassa devatānubhāveka dārake gahetvā gantvā sañjaya nariṇdassa purato gataṭṭhānaṃ tato vaṅkapabbatakucchiyaṃ
anya-e1202n0:517_6: channaṃ khattiyānaṃ samāgamaṃ vessantarassa maddiyā ca abhisekaṃ pattaṭṭhānaṃ nakarampaviṭṭhe sattaratanavassaṃ
anya-e1202n0:517_7: vassitaṭṭhānaṃ tato cavitvā tusitapure nibbattaṭṭhānañca sabbaṃ vitthārena kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:518_0: Tato dasa sahassa cakkavāḷadevatāhi buddha bhāvāya āyācitaṭṭhānaṃ apunarāvattanaṃ mātukucchiokkamanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:518_1: mahāmāyādeviṃ suddhodana mahārājaṃ lumbinīvane jātaṭṭhānaṃ antalikkhato dvinnaṃ udakadhārānaṃ patanaṃ
anya-e1202n0:518_2: uttarābhimukhaṃ sattapadavītihāra gamanaṃ kāḷadevaḷassa jaṭāmatthake mahāpurisassa pādapatiṭṭhāna anativattamānāya
anya-e1202n0:518_3: jambucchāyāya dhātīnaṃ pamādaṃ disvā sirisayane pallaṅke nisīditvā jhānasamāpannaṭṭhānañca kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:519_0: Tato rāhula mātaraṃ rāhula bhaddakañca kāresi tato ekūna tiṃsavassakāle uyyāne kīḷatatthāya gamana samaye
anya-e1202n0:519_1: jiṇṇa vyādhita mata saṅkhyāte tayo devadūte disvā nivattanaṭṭhānaṃ catutthavāre pabbajitarūpaṃ disvā
anya-e1202n0:519_2: sādhupabbajjāti cittaṃ uppādetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā uyyānasiriṃ anubhavitvā sāyaṇha samaye nahātvā maṅgala
anya-e1202n0:519_3: silāpaṭṭe nisinnamatta vissakaṭṭhānā alaṅkaraṇaṭṭhāṇaṃ tato majjhimarattiyaṃ nāṭakānaṃ vippakāraṃ disvā
anya-e1202n0:519_4: kaṇthaka haya varamāruyha) mahābhinikkhamaṇaṃ nikkhamitaṭṭhānaṃ dasa sahassa) cakkavāḷa devatāhi kata
anya-e1202n0:519_5: pūjāvidhiṃ kaṇthakanivattana cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ anomā nadītīre pabbajjaṃ rājagahappavesanaṃ paṇḍava pabbataccha
anya-e1202n0:519_6: yāya rañño bimbisāramma rajjakaraṇatthāya āyācanaṃ sujātāya dinna khīrapāyāsa paṭiggahaṇaṃ nerañjarāya
anya-e1202n0:519_7: nadiyā tīre pāyāsa paribhogaṃ nadiyā pātivissaṭṭhaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ sālavane divāvihāra gataṭṭhānaṃ sotthiyena
anya-e1202n0:519_8: dinna kusatiṇapaṭiggahaṇaṃ bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha nisinnaṭṭhānañca sabbaṃ vitthārena kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:520_0: Tato mahiṇdatthera pamukhe satta saha āgate ca kārāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:520_1: Catusu disāsu khaggahatthe cattāro mahārājāno kāresi tato dvattiṃsa devaputte tato suvaṇṇa daṇḍa dīpakadhārā
anya-e1202n0:520_2: dvattiṃsa devakumāriyo tato aṭṭhavīsati yakkhasenāpatino tato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhita devatāyo tato ratanamaya
anya-e1202n0:520_3: puppakalāpe gahetvā ṭhita devatāyo tato suvaṇṇaghaṭe gahetvā ṭhiti devatāyo tato naccanaka devatāyo tato
anya-e1202n0:520_4: turiyavādaka devatāyo tato pacceka satasahassagghanake dasahatthappamāṇe ādāse gahetvā ṭhita devatāyo
anya-e1202n0:520_5: tato tatheva satasahassagghanaka puppha sākhāyo gahetvā ṭhitadevatāyo tato caṇdamaṇḍale gahetvā ṭhitadevatāyo
anya-e1202n0:520_6: sūriyamaṇḍale gahetvā ṭhitadevatāyo tato padumāni gahetvā ṭhita devatāyo tato chattāni gahetvā ṭhitadevatāyo
anya-e1202n0:520_7: tato vicittavesadhare malladevaputte tato dussapoṭhana devatāyo tato ratanagghike gahetvā ṭhitadevatāyo
anya-e1202n0:520_8: tato dhammacakkāki gahetvā ṭhitadevatāyo tato khaggadharā devatāyo tato pañcahatthappamāṇa gaṇdhitelapūritā
anya-e1202n0:520_9: dukūlavaṭṭiyaṃ pajjalita dīpakañcanana pātiyo sīsehi dhāretvā ṭhitadevatāyo ca kārāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:521_0: Tato catusukaṇṇesuphaḷikamayaagghiya matthake cattāromahāmaṇa ṭhapāpesi catusu kaṇṇesu suvaṇṇa- maṇi- mutta-
anya-e1202n0:521_1: vajirānaṃ cattāro rāsiyo kāresi tato meghavaṇṇa pāsāṇabhittiyaṃ vijjullatā kāresi tato ratana latāyo
anya-e1202n0:521_2: tato cāḷavijatiyo tato niluppale gahetvā ṭhita nāgamaṇavikāyo kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:522_0: Rājā ektikāni rūpakāni ghanakoṭṭima suvaṇṇeheva kāresi.
anya-e1202n0:522_2: Ettha ca vuttappakārampana pūjanīyabhaṇḍaṃ anantamaparimāṇaṃ hoti tathā hi ambapāsānavāsī cittaguttattheronāma
anya-e1202n0:522_3: heṭṭhā lohapāsāde sannipatitānaṃ dvādasannaṃ bhikkhusahassānaṃ dhammaṃ kathento rathavinītasuttaṃ ārabhitvā
anya-e1202n0:522_4: mahā dhātunidhānaṃ vaṇṇento ekacce na saddahissantīti maññamāno osakkitvā kathesi.
anya-e1202n0:522_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe koṭapabbatavāsī mahātissatthero nāma khīṇāsavo avidūre nisīditvā dhammaṃ suṇanto āvuso dhammakathika tava kathāto parihīnampi atthi.
anya-e1202n0:522_7: Atha imasmiṃyeva dīpe bhātiya mahārājā nāma saddo pasanno ahosi so sāyaṃ pātaṃ mahacetiyaṃ vaṇditvāva bhuñjati.
anya-e1202n0:522_8: Ekadivasaṃ vinicchaye nisīditva dubbīnicchitaṃ aṭṭaṃ vinicchinanto atisāyaṃ vuṭṭhito thūpavaṇdanaṃ vissaritvā
anya-e1202n0:522_9: bhojane upanīte hatthaṃ otāretvā manusse pucchiajja mayā ayyako vaṇdito na vaṇditoti.
anya-e1202n0:522_10: Porāṇaka rājāno hi satthāraṃ ayyakoti vadanti.
anya-e1202n0:523_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā hatthena gahita bhattapiṇḍaṃ pātiyaṃ pātetvā uṭṭhāya dakkhiṇadvāraṃ vivarāpetvā āgantvā
anya-e1202n0:523_1: pācīna dvārena mahācetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha vaṇdanto anto dhātugabbhe khīṇāsavānaṃ dhammaṃ osāraṇasaddaṃ sutvā
anya-e1202n0:523_2: dakkhiṇadvāreti maññamāno tattha gantvā adisvā eteneva nayena itarānipi dvārāni gantvā tatthāpi adisvā
anya-e1202n0:523_3: ayyā dhammaṃ osārento vicarantīti maññamāno olokanatthāya catusu dvāresu manusse ṭhapetvā sayaṃ puna
anya-e1202n0:523_4: vicaritvā apassanto manusse pucchitvā bahiddhā natthi bhāvaṃ ñatvā anto dhātugabbhe bhavissatiti sanniṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:523_5: katvā pācīnadvāre āsannatare mahā cetiyābhimukho hatthapāde pasāretvā jīvituṃ pariccajitvā daḷhasamādānaṃ
anya-e1202n0:523_7: Sace mā ayyā dhātugabbhaṃ na olokāpenti-
anya-e1202n0:523_8: sattāhaṃ nirāhāro hutvā sussamāno bhūsamuṭṭhi viya vippakiriyamānopi na uṭṭhahissāmīti.
anya-e1202n0:523_9: Tassa guṇānubhāvena sakkassa bhavanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
anya-e1202n0:524_0: Sakko āvajjanto taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā agantvā dhammaṃ osārentānaṃ therānaṃ evamāha.
anya-e1202n0:524_1: Ayaṃ bhante rājā dhammiko buddhasāsane pasanno imasmiṃ ṭhāne sajjhāyana saddaṃ sutvā dhātugabbhaṃ apassitvā
anya-e1202n0:524_2: na uṭṭhahissāmīti daḷhasamādānaṃ katvā nipanno sace dhātugabbhaṃ na passati tattheva marissati.
anya-e1202n0:524_4: Therāpi tassa anukampāya dhātugabbhaṃ dassetuṃ ekaṃ theraṃ āṇāpesuṃ rājānaṃ ānetvā dhātugabbhā olokāpetvā pesehīti.
anya-e1202n0:524_5: So rañño hatthe gahetvā dhātugabbhaṃ pavesetvā yathāruciṃ vaṇdāpetvā sabbaṃ sallakkhitakāle pesesi rājā
anya-e1202n0:524_6: nagaraṃ gantvā aparena samayena dhātugabbhe attanā diṭṭharūpakesu ekadesāni suvaṇṇakhacitāni kāretvā
anya-e1202n0:524_7: rājaṅgaṇe mahantaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā tasmiṃ maṇḍape tāni rūpakāni saṃvidahāpetvā nagare sannipātetvā dhātugabbhe
anya-e1202n0:524_9: Tesaṃ rūpakānaṃ niyāmena katattā niyāmaka rūpakāni nāma jātāni.
anya-e1202n0:525_0: Rājā saṃvacchare saṃvacchare tāni rūpakāni nīharāpetvā nāgarānaṃ dassesi paṭhamaṃ dassitakāle nāgarā
anya-e1202n0:525_1: pasīditvā ekeka kulato ekekaṃ dārakaṃ nīharitvā pabbājesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:525_2: Puna rājā ayyā etaṃ pakāraṃ ajānanakā bahū tesampi ārocessāmīti vihāraṃ gantvā heṭṭhā lohapāsāde bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
anya-e1202n0:525_3: sannipātetvā sayaṃ dhammāsanagato tiyāma rattiṃ dhātugabbhe adhikāraṃ kathetvā pariyosāpetumasakkāntoseva uṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:525_6: Tiyāma rattiṃ vaṇṇento dhātugabbhe pūjāvidhimpi pariyosāpetuṃ nāsakkhi aññampi bahuṃ atthiti.
anya-e1202n0:526_1: tumhākaṃ mayā kathitaṃ dasabhāgesu ekabhāgampi nappahoti.
anya-e1202n0:526_3: Anantaṃ bhante dhātugabbhe pūjāvidhānanti āha evaṃ anantaṃ pūjanīyabhaṇḍaṃ samacaturasse ekeka passato
anya-e1202n0:526_4: asīti asīti hatthappamāṇe dhātugabbhe nirantaraṃ katvā puretumpi na sukaraṃ,
anya-e1202n0:526_5: pageva yathārahaṃ saṃvidhātu tiṭṭhatu tāva dhātugabbho yāva mahācetiye vāluka pākāra paricchedā nirantaraṃ puretumpi na sakkā.
anya-e1202n0:526_6: Tasmā taṃ sabbaṃ pūjanīyabhaṇḍaṃ tattha kathaṃ gaṇhīti yadettha vattabbaṃ porāṇehi vuttameva.
anya-e1202n0:527_0: Nigro dhapiṭṭhi tepiṭaka mahāsīvatthero kira rājagehe nisiditvā rañño dasabala sīhanādasutataṃ kathento dhātunidhānaṃ vaṇṇetvā suttantaṃ vinivaṭṭesi.
anya-e1202n0:527_3: ekekapassato asīti asīti hatthappamāṇe ettakāni pūjanīya bhaṇḍāni ettha ṭṭhitānīti ko saddahessatiti.
anya-e1202n0:527_8: mahārāja amhākaṃ satthārā sakkasasa sakka pañhasuttantaṃ kathanadivase guhāya kittakā parisā osaṭāti sutapubbāti.
anya-e1202n0:527_9: Rājā dvīsu bhante devalokesu devatāti āha.
anya-e1202n0:527_10: Evaṃ sante tampi asaddaheyyaṃ nu mahārājāti therena vutte rājā taṃ pana devānaṃ deviddhiyā ahosi deviddhi nāma acinteyyā bhanteti āha.
anya-e1202n0:528_0: Tato thero mahārāja taṃ ekāyayeva deviddhiyā ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:528_1: Idaṃ pana rañño rājiddhiyā devānaṃ deviddhiyā ariyānaṃ ariyiddhiyāti imāhi tīhi iddhīhi jātanti avoca.
anya-e1202n0:528_2: Rājā therassa vacanaṃ sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā theraṃ setacchattena pūjetvā matthake chattaṃ dhārento mahā
anya-e1202n0:528_3: vihāraṃ ānetvā puna mahācetiyassa sattāhaṃ chattaṃ datvā jāti sumanapuppha pūjaṃ akāsīti.
anya-e1202n0:528_4: Etassatthassa sādhanatthameva aññānipi bahūni vatthūni dassitāni tāni kintehīti amhe upekkhitāni ettha
anya-e1202n0:528_5: ca rājā mahesakkho mahānubhāvo pūritapārami katābhinīhāroti tassavasena rājiddhiveditabbā sakkena āṇattena
anya-e1202n0:528_6: vissakammunā devaputtena ādito paṭṭhāya āvisitvā katattā tassa vasena devidadhi veditabbā,
anya-e1202n0:528_7: kammādhiṭṭhāyaka iṇdaguttatthero khuddānukhuddakaṃ kammaṃ anuvidhāyanto kāresi na kevalaṃtheroyeva,
anya-e1202n0:528_8: sabbepi ariyā attanā attanā kattabba kiccesu ussukkamāpannāyeva ahesunti imāhi tīhi iddhīhi katanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e1202n0:535_1: Evaṃ rājā dhātugabbhe kattabba kammaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā cātuddasi divase vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātesi,
anya-e1202n0:535_2: sannipatti bhikkhū tiṃsa sahassāni ahesuṃ rājā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vaṇditvā evamāha.
anya-e1202n0:535_4: sve āsāḷabhimuposatha divase uttarasāḷha nakkhattena dhātunidhānaṃ bhavissati dhātuyo janātha bhanteti bhikkhusaṅghassa bhāraṃ katvā nagaramevāgañji.
anya-e1202n0:536_0: Atha bhikkhusaṅgho dhātu āharaṇakaṃ bhikkhuṃ gavesanto pūjā pariveṇa vāsikaṃ soḷasa vassuddesikaṃ chaḷabhiññaṃ
anya-e1202n0:536_1: soṇuttaraṃ nāma sāmaṇeraṃ disvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā āvuso soṇuttara rājā dhātugabbhaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā dhātu
anya-e1202n0:536_3: Tasmā tayā dhātuyo āharitabbāti āharāmi bhante dhātuyo kuto lacchāmīti pucchi tassa bhikkhusaṅgho evamāha.
anya-e1202n0:536_4: Āvuso soṇuttara tatāgato maraṇamañce nipanno sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ āmantetvā mayhaṃ aṭṭhadoṇappamāṇesu sārīrika
anya-e1202n0:536_6: anāgate tambapaṇṇi dīpe mahācetiye patiṭṭhahissatīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:537_0: Atha bhagavati parinibbute doṇa brāhmaṇo dhātuyo aṭṭha koṭṭhāse katvā aṭṭhannaṃ nagaravāsīnaṃ adāsi te
anya-e1202n0:537_1: attano attano nagare cetiyaṃ kāretvā parihariṃsu tesu rāmagāme koḷiyehi katacetiye mahoghena bhinne dhātukaraṇḍako
anya-e1202n0:537_2: samuddaṃ pavisitvā ratanavālukā piṭṭhe chabbaṇṇaraṃsi samākiṇṇo aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:538_0: Nāgā disvā mañjerika nāga bhavanaṃ gantvā mahākāḷa nāga rañño ārocesuṃ so dasakoṭi nāga sahassa parivuto āgantvā gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā suvaṇṇa- pavāḷa- miṇi-
anya-e1202n0:538_1: rajatadhaje ussāpetvā pañcaṅgika turiya paggahīta nānāvidha nāga nāṭakānaṃ majjhahato dhākukaraṇḍaṃ maṇicaṅgoṭake
anya-e1202n0:538_2: ṭhapetvā sīsenādāya mahāsakkāra sammānaṃ karonto nāgabhavanaṃ netvā channavuti koṭidhane pūjetvā sabbaratanehi
anya-e1202n0:538_4: Mahākassapatthero ajātasattuno dhātunidhānaṃ karonto rāmagāme dhātuyo ṭhapetvā sesa dhātuyo āharitvā
anya-e1202n0:538_5: adāsi rājā rāmagāme dhātuyo kasmā nāhaṭāti pucchi.
anya-e1202n0:539_0: Thero mahārāja tāsaṃ antarāyo natthi anāgate tambapaṇṇidīpe mahācetiye patiṭṭhahissantīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:539_1: Asoko dhammarājāpi dhātunidhānaṃ ugghāṭetvā olokento aṭṭhamaṃ dhātudoṇaṃ adisvā aparaṃ dhātuṃ doṇaṃ kattha
anya-e1202n0:539_2: bhanteti pucchi mahārāja taṃ koḷiyehi gaṅgātīre kata cetiye patiṭṭhitaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:540_0: Taṃ nāgā disvā attano nāgabhavanaṃ netvā pariharantīti khīṇāsavā āhaṃsu rājā nāgabhavanaṃ nāma mama āṇāpavattanaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:540_2: Mahārāja tā dhātuyo anāgate tambapaṇṇidīpe mahācetiye patiṭṭhahissantiti nivāresuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:540_3: Tasmā tvaṃ mañcherika nāga bhavanaṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ nāga rañño nivedetvā dhātuyo āhara,
anya-e1202n0:540_5: Soṇuttaro sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā attano pariveṇaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e1202n0:541_0: Rājāpi nagaraṃ antvā nagare bheriṃ carāpesi-
anya-e1202n0:541_1: sve dhātunidhānaṃ bhavissati nāgarā attano attano vibhavānurūpena alaṅkaritvā gaṇdhamālādīni gahetvā mahācetiyaṅgaṇaṃ otarantuti.
anya-e1202n0:541_5: So punadivase ekūnayojanasatikaṃ tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ kasīṇamaṇḍalaṃ viya samaṃ katvā rajatapaṭṭasadisaṃ vālukākiṇṇaṃpañcavaṇṇapupphasamākūlaṃ
anya-e1202n0:541_6: katvā samantato puṇṇaghaṭapantiyo ṭhapāpetvā sāṇīhi parikkhipitvā upari celavitānaṃ baṇdhitvā pathavitale
anya-e1202n0:541_7: thalapadumāni ākāse olambaka padumāni dassetvā alaṅkata devasabhaṃ viya sajjesi.
anya-e1202n0:542_0: Dhātu ānubhāvena sakala cakkavāḷaṃ gabbhokkamanābhisambodhikālādisu viya sajjitaṃ ahosi nāgarāpa nagara
anya-e1202n0:542_1: vīthiyo sammajjitvā muttāphala sadisaṃ vālukaṃ okiritvā lājapañcamaka pupphāni samokiritvā nānāvirāga
anya-e1202n0:542_2: dhajapaṭākāyo ussāpetvā suvaṇṇaghaṭa kadalitoraṇa mālagaghikādīhi alaṅkaritvā nagaraṃ sajjesu.
anya-e1202n0:542_3: Rājā nagarassa catusu dvāresu anāthānaṃ manussānaṃ paribhotthāya nānāppakāra khādanīya bhojanīya gaṇdhamāla
anya-e1202n0:542_4: vatthābharaṇa pañcavidhi mudhavāsa sahita tāmbulāni ca ṭhapāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:543_0: Atha rājā sabbābharaṇa vibhūsito kumuda pannavaṇṇa catusiṇdhavayutta rathavaramāruyha alaṅkataṃ kaṇḍulaṃ
anya-e1202n0:543_1: hatthiṃ purato katvā suvaṇṇacaṅgoṭakaṃ sīse katvā setacchattassa heṭṭhā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:543_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ devaccharā viya nānābharaṇavibhūsitā devakaññupamā aneka sahassa nāṭakitthiyo
anya-e1202n0:543_3: ceva dasamahāyodhā ca caturaṅginī senā ca rājānaṃ parivāresuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:544_0: Tathā aṭṭhuttara sahassa itthiyo ca puṇṇaghaṭe garahatvā parivāresuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:544_1: Aṭṭhuttara sahassa aṭṭhuttara sarassappamāṇeyeva purisā ceva itthiyo ca pupphasamuggāni daṇḍadīpikā nānāvaṇṇa dhaje ca gahetvā parivāresuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:544_2: Evaṃ rājā mahantena rājānubhāvena naṇdanavanaṃ nikkhanta devarājā viya nikkhami.
anya-e1202n0:544_3: Tadā nānāvidha turiya ghosehi ceva hatthassa ratha saddehi ca mahāpathavibhijjanākārappattā viya ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:545_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe soṇuttaro attano pariveṇeyeva nisinno turiya ghosena rañño nikkhantabhāvaṃ ñatvā abhiññāpādakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:545_1: catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā adhiṭṭhayā pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā mañjerika nāgabhavane mahākāḷānāgarañño
anya-e1202n0:545_3: Nāgarājā soṇuttaraṃ disvā uṭṭhāyāsanā abhivādetvā gaṇdhodakena pāde dhovitvā vaṇṇa gaṇdha sampanna kusumehi
anya-e1202n0:545_4: pūjetvā ekāmantaṃ nisīditvā kuto āgatattha bhanteti pucchi tambapaṇṇi dīpato āgatamhāhi vutte kimatthāyāti pucchi.
anya-e1202n0:546_0: Mahārāja tambapaṇṇidīpe duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhaya mahārājā mahā cetiyaṃ kārento dhātuyo bhikkhusaṅghassa bhāramakāsi.
anya-e1202n0:546_1: Mahāvihāre tiṃsamattāni bhikkhusahassāni sannipatitvā mahāthūpatthāya ṭhapitadhātuyo mahākāḷa nāga rañño santike ṭhitā,
anya-e1202n0:546_2: tassa taṃ pavattiṃ kathetvā dhātuyo āharāti maṃ pesesuṃ,
anya-e1202n0:547_0: Taṃ sutvā nāgarājā pabbatena viya ajjhotthaṭo mahantena madāmanassena abhibhūto evaṃ cintesi mayaṃ pana
anya-e1202n0:547_1: imā dhātuyo pūjetvā apāyato muñcitvā sagge nibbattissamāti amaññimha.
anya-e1202n0:547_3: sace imā dhātuyo imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e1202n0:547_5: Dhātuyo apanetuṃ vaṭṭatīti cintetvā parisaṃ olokento parisa pariyante ṭhitaṃ vāsuladattaṃ nāma attano
anya-e1202n0:547_6: bhāgineyyaṃ disvā tassa saññamadāsi so mātulassa adhippāyaṃ ñatvā cetiyagharaṃ gantvā dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:554_0: Bahū devā ca nāgā ca-osariṃsu tahiṃ tadā,
anya-e1202n0:556_0: Tato nāgarājā bhāgineyyena dhātuyo apanītabhāvaṃ ñatvā evamāha-
anya-e1202n0:556_2: tumhe idha papañca akatvā sīghaṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetha bhikkhusaṅgho aññato dhātuṃ
anya-e1202n0:556_3: pariyesissatīti sāmaṇero ādite paṭṭhāya dhātu āgamanaṃ vatvā dhātuyo tava santikeyeva,
anya-e1202n0:557_0: Tato nāgarājā sāmaṇerena mūlamhi gahitabhāvaṃ ñatvā yena kenaci pariyāyena dhātuyo adatvāva pesituṃ vaṭṭatīti
anya-e1202n0:557_1: cintetvā sāmaṇeraṃ dhātugharaṃ netvā cetiyañca cetiyagharañca dassesi.
anya-e1202n0:557_2: Taṃ pana cetiyañca cetiyagharañca sabbaratanamayameva ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:561_0: Dassetvā ca pana cetiyagharato oruyha addhacaṇdakapāsāṇe pavāḷapadumamhi ṭhatvā imassa cetiyassa cetiyagharassa
anya-e1202n0:561_1: ca agghaṃ karohi bhanteti āha sāmaṇero na sakkoma mahārāja agghaṃ kātuṃ,
anya-e1202n0:561_2: sakalepi tambhapaṇṇidīpe ratanāni imaṃ addhacaṇdaka pāsāṇaṃ nāgghatīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:562_0: Nāgarājā evaṃ sante mahāsakkāraṭṭhānato appasakkāraṭṭhānaṃ dhātūnaṃ nayanaṃ ayuttaṃ nanu bhikkhūti āha.
anya-e1202n0:562_3: tumhesu cakkavāḷappamāṇaṃ ratanagharaṃ māpetvā sabbaratanassa pūretvā dhātuyo pariharantesupi ekanāgopi
anya-e1202n0:562_4: dhammābhisamayaṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi yasmā-
anya-e1202n0:564_2: Evaṃ vutte nāgarājā appaṭihāno yutvā attano bhāgineyyena dhātuyo gopitoti maññamāno evamāha.
anya-e1202n0:564_3: Tumhe bhante cetiye dhātūnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ vā natthibhāvaṃ vā ajānantā dehi dehīti vadatha.
anya-e1202n0:569_0: Tadā sāmaṇerassa nāgena saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ passissāmāti samāgatā deva-
anya-e1202n0:569_1: nāga parisāpa bhikkhunāgassa vijayaṃ disvā haṭṭhā pamodito dhātuyo pūjayantāva teneva saha āgamuṃ,
anya-e1202n0:569_2: nāgarājā sāmaṇerassa gata kāle bhikkhuṃ vañcetvā pesitomhīti haṭṭhatuṭṭho dhātuyo gahetvā āgamatthāya bhāgineyyassa sāsanaṃ pesesi.
anya-e1202n0:574_0: Tato nāgabhavane sabbe nāgā samāgantvā kese muñcitvā ubhohi hatthehi hadaye gahetvā nīluppala sadisehi
anya-e1202n0:577_1: bhante kassaci pīḷaṃ akatvā amhākaṃ puññānubhāvena labhitvā cīraparihaṭa dhātuyo kasmā anavasesaṃ katvā
anya-e1202n0:580_0: Tato sakko devānamiṇdo vissakammaṃ āmantetvā sāmaṇerassa uṭṭhitaṭṭhāne sattaratanamayaṃ maṇḍapaṃ māpehīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:580_1: So tasmiyeva khaṇe maṇḍapaṃ māpesi atha sakko dvīsu devalokesu devaparisāya parivuto suvaṇṇacaṅgoṭakena
