anya-e1202n0:580_2: saddhiṃ ratana pallaṅkamādāya āgantvā tasmiṃ maṇḍape patiṭṭhāpetvā sāmaṇerassa hatthato dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:595_0: Tadā iṇdaguttatthero mārassa paṭibāhanatthāya cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ katvā ākāse lohachattaṃ māpesi.
anya-e1202n0:595_1: Pañcanikāyika therā dhātuyo parivāretvā pañcasu ṭhānesu nisīditvā gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:595_2: Tasmiṃ kāle rājā taṃ ṭhanaṃ āgantvā sisato suvaṇṇa caṅgoṭakaṃ otāretvā dhātu caṅgoṭakaṃ attano caṅgoṭake
anya-e1202n0:595_3: ṭhapetvā pallaṅke patiṭṭhāpetvā gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vaṇditvā sirasi añjaliṃ paggayha
anya-e1202n0:595_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe dhātumatthake setacchattaṃ dissati chattagāhaka brahmā na dissati.
anya-e1202n0:595_6: Tathā tālavaṇṭa vijani ādayo dissanti gāhakā na dissanti dibbaturiyaghosa saṅgitiyo suyyanti gaṇdhabba devatā na dissanti.
anya-e1202n0:595_7: Rājā etaṃ acchariyaṃ disvā iṇdaguttattheraṃ evamāha-
anya-e1202n0:595_8: devatā dibbachattena pūjesuṃ ahaṃ mānusa kacchattena pūjemi bhanneti.
anya-e1202n0:595_10: Rājā attano suvaṇṇapiṇḍike setacchattena pūjetvā suvaṇṇabhiṃkāraṃ gahetvā abhisekodakaṃ datvā taṃ divasaṃ sakalatambapaṇṇi dīpe rajjaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1202n0:596_1: gaṇdhamālādīhi pūjetva mahantaṃ sakkāramakaṃsu puna rājā theraṃ pucchi -
anya-e1202n0:596_2: amhākaṃ satthā dibbamānusakāni dve chattāni dhāresi bhante.
anya-e1202n0:596_3: Na dve chattāni tīṇi chattāni mahārājāti.
anya-e1202n0:596_5: Sīlapatiṭṭhaṃ samādhidaṇḍakaṃ iṇdriyasalākaṃ balamālaṃ maggaphalapatta sañchannaṃ vimuttivarasetacchattaṃ
anya-e1202n0:596_6: ussāpetvā ñāṇābhisekampatto dhammaratana cakkaṃ pavattetvā dasasahassa cakkavāḷesu buddharajjaṃ hatthagataṃ
anya-e1202n0:596_7: katvā rajjaṃ kāresīti rājā tīṇicchatta dhārakassa satthuno tikkhattuṃ rajjaṃ dammīti tikkhattuṃ dhātuyo
anya-e1202n0:597_0: Tato rājā devamanussesu dibbagaṇdhamālādīhi pūjentesu anekesu turiyaghosa saṅgitesu vattamānesu dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:597_1: sīsenādāya ratanamaṇḍapato nikkhamitvā bhikkhusaṅgha parivuto mahācetiyaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pācīnadvārenāruyha
anya-e1202n0:597_3: Tato mahācetiyaṃ parivāretvā channavuti koṭippamāṇa arahanto aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:598_0: Rājā sīsato dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ otāretvā mahārahe sayanapiṭṭhe ṭhapessāmīti cintesi tasmiṃ khaṇe dhātukaraṇḍako
anya-e1202n0:598_1: rañño sīsato satta tālappamāṇe ṭhāne gantvā sayameva vicari dhātuyo ākāsamuggantvā dvattiṃsa mahā purisalakkhaṇa
anya-e1202n0:598_2: asiti anubyañjanā byāmappabhā patimaṇḍitaṃ ketumālopa sobhitaṃ nila- pīta-
anya-e1202n0:598_3: lohitādi bheda vicitra raṃsijālā samujjalaṃ buddhavesaṃ gahetvā gaṇḍambamūle yamaka pāṭihāriyaṃ sadisa yamaka pāṭihāriyaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:598_4: Taṃ dhātupāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasīditvā arahattampattā devamanussā dvādasakoṭiyo ahesuṃ.
anya-e1202n0:598_6: Evaṃ dhātuyo anekadhā pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā buddhavesaṃ vissajjetvā karaṇḍakaṃ pavisitvā tena saddhiṃ otaritvā rañño sīse patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:599_0: Rājā amatena viya abhisitto saphalaṃ manussatta paṭilābhaṃ maññamāno ubhohi hatthehi dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ
anya-e1202n0:599_1: gahetvā nāṭaka parivuto alaṅkata sayana samīpaṃ gantvā dhātucaṅgoṭakaṃ ratanapallaṅke ṭhapetvā gaṇdhavāsitodakena
anya-e1202n0:599_2: hatthe dhovitvā vatujātiya gaṇdhena ubbaṭṭetvā ratanakaraṇḍakaṃ vicaritvā dhātuyo gahetvā evaṃ cintesi.
anya-e1202n0:601_0: Janassa saraṇaṃ hutvā yadi ṭhassanti dhātuyo;
anya-e1202n0:604_0: Evaṃ cintetvā pana varasayanapiṭṭhe dhātuyo ṭhapesi tasmiṃ khaṇe dhātuyo raññā cintita niyāmeneva mahārahe sayane buddhavesena sayiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:607_0: Saha dhātu patiṭṭhānā akampittha mahāmahī, pāṭihīrāni nekāni pavattiṃsu anekadhā.”
anya-e1202n0:608_0: Tadahi udakapariyantaṃ katvā ayaṃ mahāpathavī saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi,
anya-e1202n0:608_4: cha devalokā ekakolāhala mahosi rājā etaṃ acchariyaṃ disvā pasanno attano kañcana mālika setacchattena
anya-e1202n0:608_5: dhātuyo pūjetvā tambapaṇṇidipe rajjaṃ sattāhaṃ datvā tiṃsa satasahassagghanakaṃ alaṅkāra bhaṇḍaṃ omuñcitvā pūjesi.
anya-e1202n0:608_6: Tathā sabbāpi nāṭakitthiyo amaccā sesa mahājano devā ca sabbābharaṇāni pūjesuṃ tasmā-
anya-e1202n0:609_0: Tiṭṭhantaṃ sugataṃ tilokamahitaṃ yo pūjaye sādaraṃ,
anya-e1202n0:610_0: Yo vā sāsapa bījamattampi taṃ dhātuṃ naro pūjaye;
anya-e1202n0:611_0: Tesaṃ puññaphalaṃ samānamīti taṃ cittappasāde same,
anya-e1202n0:612_0: Ñatvā taṃ parinibbutepi sugate dhātuṃ budho pūjaye’ti;
anya-e1202n0:613_1: sappi ādi bhesajjāni ca saṅghassa datvā sabbarattiṃ gaṇasajjhāyaṃ kāresi puna divase nagare bheriṃ carāpesi
anya-e1202n0:613_2: mahājano imaṃ sattāhaṃ gaṇdhamālādīni ādiya gantvā dhātuyo vaṇdatūti iṇdaguttattheropi sakala tambapaṇṇi
anya-e1202n0:613_4: taṃ khaṇaṃyeva āgantvā vaṇditvā yathāṭṭhānaṃ gacchantūti adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1202n0:614_0: Te tatheva dhātuyo vaṇditvā gamiṃsu rājā sattāhaṃ saṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattāhassa accayena dhātugabbhe mayā kattabbakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:614_2: Saṅgho uttarasumana sāmaṇere āmantetvā tumhehi pubbe āhaṭa medavaṇṇa pāsāṇena dhātu gabbhaṃ pidahathāti āha.
anya-e1202n0:615_0: Tato khīṇāsavā dhātugabbhe gaṇdhā mā susantu mālā mā milāyantu.
anya-e1202n0:615_1: Dīpā mā nibbāyantu ratanāni mā vivaṇṇāni hontu pūjanīyabhaṇḍāni mā nassantu.
anya-e1202n0:616_0: Evaṃ rājā dhātu nidhāpetvā puna nagare bheriṃ carāpesi mahā cetiye dhātuṃ nidhāpetvā dhātuṃ āharitvā nidhānaṃ karontūti.
anya-e1202n0:616_1: Mahājano attano attano balānurūpena suvaṇṇa rajatādi karaṇḍe kārāpetvā tattha dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā dhātunidhānassupari
anya-e1202n0:617_0: Iti sādhujana manopasādanatthāya kate thūpavaṃse dhātunidhāna kathā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e1202n0:618_1: Tato rājā taṃ sabbaṃ pidahetvā cetiyaṃ karonto udarena saddhiṃ caturassa koṭṭhakaṃ niṭṭhāpesi atha chattakamme
anya-e1202n0:618_2: sudhākamme ca aniṭṭhiteyeva māraṇantika rogena gilāno hutvā dīghavāpito kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ pakkosāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:618_3: cetiye aniṭṭhitaṃ chattakammaṃ sudhākammañca sīghaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā maṃ tosehi tātāti āha.
anya-e1202n0:618_4: So rañño dubbalabhāvaṃ ñatvā antare aniṭṭhitakammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkāti suddhavatthehi kañcukaṃ kāretvā
anya-e1202n0:618_5: cetiye paṭimuñcāpetvā cittakārehi kañcuka matthake vedikā ca puṇṇaghaṭa pañcaṅguli pantiyo ca kārāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:619_0: Naḷakārehi veḷumaya chattaṃ kāretvā kharapattamaye caṇdasūriyamaṇḍale muddhani vedikā kāretvā lākhākukuṭṭhakehi
anya-e1202n0:619_1: taṃ vicittaṃ katvā thūpakammaṃ niṭṭhitanti rañño arocesi rājā tena hi maṃ mahācetiyaṃ dassehīti vatvā
anya-e1202n0:619_2: sivikāya nipajjitvā cetiyā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dakkhiṇadvāre bhūmisayanaṃ paññāpetvā tattha nipanno dakkhiṇena
anya-e1202n0:619_3: passena sayitvā mahāthūpaṃ vāmapassena sayitvā lohapāsādaṃ olokento pasanna citto ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:619_4: Tadā rañño sāsanassa bahūpakārabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā gilāna pucchanatthāya tato tato āgatā bhikkhu channavuti koṭiyo rājānaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:619_5: Tato saṅgho vagga vaggā hutvā gaṇasajjhāyaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1202n0:620_0: Rājā tasmiṃ samāgame theraputtābhayattheraṃ adisvā evaṃ cintesi.
anya-e1202n0:620_1: So mayi damiḷehi saddhiṃ aṭṭhavīsati mahāyuddhe kayiramāse apaccosakakitvā idāni maraṇayuddhe vattamāṇe mayhaṃ parājayaṃ disvā maññe nāgacchatīti.
anya-e1202n0:620_2: Tadā thero kariṇda nadī sīse pajjalita pabbate vasanto rañño parivitakkaṃ ñatvā pañcasata khīṇāsava parivusetā ākāsenāgantvā rañño purato pāturahosi.
anya-e1202n0:621_0: Rājā theraṃ disvā attano purato nisīdāpetvā evamāha bhante tumhehi saddhiṃ dasamahā yodhe gahetvā damiḷehi saddhi yujdhiṃ.
anya-e1202n0:621_1: Idāni ekakova maccūnā saddhiṃ yujjhituṃ ārabhiṃ.
anya-e1202n0:621_2: Maccu sattumpana parājetuṃ na sakkomīti. Tato-
anya-e1202n0:624_1: Mahārāja sabboyeva loka sannivāse jātiyā anugato,
anya-e1202n0:627_0: Evaṃ jarā ca maccu ca-adhivattanti pāṇino,
anya-e1202n0:628_0: Khattiyo brāhmaṇe vesse sudde caṇḍāla pukkuse,
anya-e1202n0:630_0: Na tattha hatthinaṃ bhūmi-na rathānaṃ na pattiyā,
anya-e1202n0:631_0: Na cāpi mantayuddhena-sakkā jetuṃ dhanena vā”ti;
anya-e1202n0:632_0: Tasmā idaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma mahāyasānaṃ mahāsammatādīnaṃ mahā puññānaṃ jotiyādīnaṃ mahāthāmānaṃ baladevādīnaṃ
anya-e1202n0:632_1: iddhimantānaṃ mahāmoggallānādīnaṃ paññāvantānaṃ sāriputtādīnaṃ sayambhūñāṇena adhigata saccānaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:632_2: paccekabuddhānaṃ sabbaguṇasamannāgatānaṃ sammāsambuddhānampi upari nirāsaṅkameva patati kimaṅgapanaññesu sattesu.
anya-e1202n0:634_0: Mahāyasā rājavarā gatā te sabbe mahāsammata ādayopi,
anya-e1202n0:635_0: Aniccabhāvaṃ baladeva ādi mahābalā ceva tathā gamiṃsu;
anya-e1202n0:636_0: Ye puññavantāni gatā pasiddhiṃ mahaddhanaṃ jotiyameṇḍakādī,
anya-e1202n0:637_0: Upāvisiṃ vaccumukhaṃ sabhogā sabbepi te rāhumukhaṃ sasīva;
anya-e1202n0:638_0: Yo iddhimantesu tathāgatassa puttesuseṭṭho iti vissutopi,
anya-e1202n0:639_0: Thero mahārājasaheva iddhibalena so maccumukhaṃ paviṭṭho;
anya-e1202n0:640_0: Sabbesu sattesu jinaṃ ṭhapetvā nevatthi paññāya samopi yena,
anya-e1202n0:641_0: So dhammasenāpati sāvakopi gato mahārāja aniccataṃ’ca;
anya-e1202n0:642_0: Sayambhūñāṇassa balena santiṃ gatā mahārāja sayambhūnopi,
anya-e1202n0:643_0: Sabbepi te ñāṇabalūpa pannā aniccataṃ neva atikkamiṃsu;
anya-e1202n0:645_0: Nāsakkhi gantuṃ sugatopi rāja aññesu sattesu kathāva natthi;
anya-e1202n0:646_0: Tasmā mahārāja bhavesu sattā sabbepi nāsuṃ maraṇā vimuttā,
anya-e1202n0:647_0: Sabbampi saṅkhāragataṃ aniccaṃ dūkkhaṃ anattāti vicintayassu;
anya-e1202n0:650_0: Idhāgamma bahuṃ puññaṃ akāsi ca anekadhā,
anya-e1202n0:652_0: Mahā rāja kataṃ puññaṃ yāvajja divasā tayā,
anya-e1202n0:654_0: Taṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānaso rājā bhante tumhe maccuyuddhepi apassayāti vatvā laddhassāso puññapotthakaṃ vācetuṃ āṇāpesi lekhako puññapotthakaṃ evaṃ vācesi.
anya-e1202n0:669_1: Taṃ sutvā rājā tussitvā ṭhapehi ṭhapehi bhaṇeti vatvā evamāha.
anya-e1202n0:669_2: Maricavaṭṭi vihāramahasattāhe thūpāramhasattāhe ca cātuddisa ubhato saṅghassa mahārahaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattesiṃ.
anya-e1202n0:669_3: Catuvīsati mahāvisākhapūjā kāresiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe mahābhikkhusaṅghassa tikkhattuṃ cīvaramadāsiṃ satta
anya-e1202n0:669_4: satta dīnāni laṅkā rajjaṃ sāsanassa pañcakkhattuṃ adāsiṃ sappi sannitta suparisuddha vaṭṭiyā dvādasaṭhānesu,
anya-e1202n0:669_5: sattaṃ dīpasahassaṃ jālesiṃ aṭṭhārassu ṭhānesu gilānānaṃ vejjehi bhesajjañca bhattañca niccaṃ dāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:669_7: Tattakesuyeva ṭhānesu ghatapakkajālapūve bhattena saddhiṃ niccaṃ dāpesiṃ.
anya-e1202n0:670_0: Māse māse aṭṭhasu uposathadivasesu laṅkādīpe sabbavihāresu dīpatelaṃ dāpesiṃ.
anya-e1202n0:670_1: Āmisa dānato dhammadānaṃ mahantanti sutvā heṭṭhaṃ lohapāsāde dhammāsane nisīditvā maṅgala suttaṃ osāretuṃ
anya-e1202n0:670_3: Tato paṭṭhāya dhammadesake sakkaritvā sabbavihāresu dhammakathaṃ kathāpesiṃ ekekassa dhammakathikassa
anya-e1202n0:670_4: nāḷa nāḷippamāṇāni sappiphāṇita sakkharāni caturaṅgula muṭṭhippamāṇaṃ yaṭṭhimadhukaṃ sāṭakadvayañca māsassa
anya-e1202n0:670_6: Etaṃ sabbampi issariye ṭhatvā dinnattā mama cittaṃ sa ārādheti.
anya-e1202n0:670_7: Jīvitaṃ pana anapekkhitvā duggatena mayā dinnadānadvayameva ārādhetīti.
anya-e1202n0:671_0: Taṃ sutvā abhayatthero mahārāja pasādanīyaṭṭhāneyeva pasādaṃ akāsi taṃ pana piṇḍapātadvayaṃ parissa pīḷaṃ
anya-e1202n0:671_1: akatvā laddha dhammika paccayattā attānaṃ anavaloketvā asajjamānena dinnattā paṭiggāhakānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ
anya-e1202n0:671_2: katvā dinnattā pītipāmojjaṃjanayitvā balava saddhāya dinnattā deyyadhammassa niravasesaṃ paribhogaṃ gatattāti
anya-e1202n0:671_3: imehi pañcahi kāraṇehi mahantatti vatvā mahārāja kaṅgu ambili piṇḍagāhakattheresu maliyamahādevatthero
anya-e1202n0:671_4: samantakūṭe pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ datvā paribhuñji pathavi cālanaka dhammaguttatthero kalyāṇīya vihāre
anya-e1202n0:672_0: Talaṅgaravāsī dhammaguttattheropi piyaṅgudīpe dvādasannaṃ bhikkhusahassānaṃ datvā paribhuñji.
anya-e1202n0:672_1: Maṅgaṇavāsī cuḷatissatthero kelāsakūṭe vihāre saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ datvā paribhuñji mahābhaggattheropi
anya-e1202n0:672_2: ukkānagara vihāre sattasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ datvā paribhuñji saraka bhattagāhakatthero pana piyaṅgudīpe
anya-e1202n0:672_3: dvādasannaṃ bhikkhusahassānaṃ datvā paribhogamakāsīti vatvā rañño cittaṃ hāsesi.
anya-e1202n0:673_1: ahambhante catuvīsati vassāni rajjaṃ kārento bhikkhusaṅghassa pahūpakāro ahosiṃ.
anya-e1202n0:673_2: Kāyopi me saṅghassa upakārako hotu saṅghadāsassa me sarīraṃ mahācetiyassa dassanaṭṭhāne saṅghassa kammamālake jhāpethāti.
anya-e1202n0:673_3: Tato kaniṭṭhaṃ āmantetvā’tāta! Tissa! Mahāthūpe aniṭṭhitaṃ kammaṃ sādhukaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:673_4: Sāyaṃ pāto ca mahāthūpe pupphapūjaṃ kāretvā tikkhattuṃ upahāraṃ kārehi.
anya-e1202n0:673_5: Mayā ṭhapitaṃ dānavaṭṭaṃ sabbaṃ aparihāpetvā saṅghassa kattabbakiccesu sadā appamatto hohī’ti anusāyitvā tuṇhi ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:674_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhu gaṇasajjhāyaṃ ārabhiṃsu devatā pana chadeva lokato cha rathe gahetvā ādāya paṭipāṭiyā
anya-e1202n0:674_2: amhākaṃ devaloko ramaṇīyoti vatvā attano attano devalokaṃ āgamanatthāya yāciṃsu rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā yāvāhaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāmi-
anya-e1202n0:674_3: tāva adhivāsethāti te hatthasaññāya nivāresi saṅgho gaṇasajjhāyaṃ nivāresīti maññitvā sajjhāyaṃ ṭhapāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:675_0: Rājā kasmā bhante gaṇasajjhāyaṃ ṭhapethāti āha.
anya-e1202n0:675_3: Devatā chadevalokato cha rathe ānetvā attano attano devalokaṃ gantuṃ yācanti tasmā tesaṃ yāvāhaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e1202n0:675_4: suṇāmi tāva āgamethāti saññaṃ adāsinti taṃ sutvā keci ayaṃ rājā maraṇabhayabhito vippalapati,
anya-e1202n0:675_5: maraṇato abhāyanaka satto nāma natthīti maññiṃsu.
anya-e1202n0:676_0: Tato abhayatthero āha kathaṃ mahārāja saddahituṃ sakkā cha devalokato cha rathā ānītāti taṃ sutvā rājā ākāse pupphadāmāni khipāpesi.
anya-e1202n0:676_1: Tāni gantvā visuṃ rathadhure olambiṃsu mahājano ākāse olambantāni pupphadāmāni disvā nikkaṅkho ahosi.
anya-e1202n0:677_3: buddhabhāvāya samayaṃ olokento metteyyo bodhisattopi tasmiṃyeva vasatīti āha.
anya-e1202n0:678_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tasmiṃ ālayaṃ katvā mahāthūpaṃ olokento nipannova cavitvā suttappabuddho viya tusita bhavanato āhaṭa.
anya-e1202n0:678_1: Rathe nibbattitvā attano katapuññassa thalaṃ mahājanassa pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ ratheyeva ṭhatvā dibbābharaṇa
anya-e1202n0:678_2: vibhūsito mahājanassa passantasseva tikkhattuṃ mahāthūpaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghañca vaṇditvā
anya-e1202n0:679_0: Evaṃ asāre nicaye dhanānaṃ aniccasaṅghaṃ sattaṃ sapaññā,
anya-e1202n0:680_0: Katvana cāgaṃ ratanattayamahi ādāya sāraṃ sugatiṃ vajanti;
anya-e1202n0:681_0: Rañño nāṭakatthiyo matabhāvaṃ ñatvā yattha ṭhitā makuḷaṃ mocayiṃsu tatthaṃ ṭhāne katasālā makuḷamuttasālānāmajātā.
anya-e1202n0:681_1: Rañño sarīrasmiṃ citakaṃ āropite yattha mahājano hatthe paggahetvā viraci.
anya-e1202n0:681_5: Atha rañño kaniṭṭhabhātā saddhātissamahārājā nāma hutvā cetiye aniṭṭhataṃ jattakammaṃ sudhākammañca niṭṭhāpetvā thūpamakāsīti
anya-e1202n0:682_0: Iti sādhujana manopasādanatthāya kate thūpavaṃse mahācetiye katā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e1202n0:683_1: Etarahi duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhaya mahārājassa pitā kākavaṇṇatissa rājā metteyyassa bhagavato pitā bhavissati.
anya-e1202n0:683_6: Rañño putto sāli rājakumāro putto bhavissati.
anya-e1202n0:683_7: Bhaṇḍāgārika saṅghāmacco aggupaṭṭhāko bhavissati tassāmaccassa dhītā aggupaṭṭhāyikā bhavissatīti evaṃ
anya-e1202n0:683_8: sabbepi katādhikārā hetu sampannā tassa bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā dukkhassantaṃ karitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
anya-e1202n0:692_0: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ kammaṃ karontena imaṃ mayaṃ,
anya-e1202n0:693_0: Tena etena puññena sattā gacchantu nibbutiṃ;
anya-e1202n0:701_0: Dhīmatā sukatā yena suṭṭhu sīhaḷa bhāsato
